message_content: Mom, Happy New Year! This morning, I made pork and scallion buns following your recipe, and the kids said they were delicious—just like the ones you make! What did you and Dad have for breakfast?

【Jinghai Community】Dear residents, Happy New Year! To ensure safety during the holiday, please check the gas, water, and electricity in your homes, and close doors and windows when going out. Wishing you and your family a joyful New Year's Day!

Dear Mom and Dad, Happy New Year! I took Xinxin for a walk today, and everything is fine at home. How are you both doing? Please make sure to dress warmly in this cold weather and take care to stay safe. We will come visit you as soon as the children are on winter break.
Mom, I've steamed buns and cooked millet porridge for breakfast. Why don't you and Dad come over to eat with us? The kids happen to be home too.
Xiulan, I brought some fresh millet from my hometown yesterday. Would you like me to bring some over for you? Should I leave it at the door, or would you prefer to come down and get it?

Shufen, I'd like to purchase a 10-kilogram bag of Wudeli Six-Star flour, a 5-liter bucket of Luhua peanut oil, and one bottle each of light soy sauce, vinegar, and salt. Could you please check the current prices in the store for me?
Me: Zhiqiang, dinner is almost ready. It's sweet and sour pork tenderloin and spinach. About what time will you be home?
I: Sister Xiuqin, I've gotten much more proficient with chain stitch today and managed to embroider a neat small section, all thanks to the little trick you taught me last time.

Zhou Xiuqin: That's wonderful, Xiulan! I knew you had skillful hands and could definitely do it. Bring your embroidery to the next gathering so we can take a look, and we'll learn a new stitching technique together.
Mom, the roads are slippery today because of the snow. I've already dropped off Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin at school. Please take your time when you and Dad go out, and be careful.
Mom, we made braised pork and stir-fried vegetables for dinner. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe have both finished their homework, and Xinxin is drawing. Have you and Dad eaten yet?
Sis, I have a bit of a headache today, so I'm going to rest early tonight. How have you been lately? It's getting colder, so please take good care of yourself.
Fen'er, are you asleep? I just got all the children to sleep, and I'm exhausted today. Is everything going well on your end?
Kids, Dad is almost home. The dumplings will be ready soon. Wash your hands and get ready for dinner!
Ma Mingzhe: Received! Mom, will the dumplings I made have the fillings leak out?

Zhang Shufen: Xiulan, the children's clothing store needs 20 bibs with little tiger patterns. Please take a look at the initial sample. If you can make them, come to the store tomorrow to pick up the fabric and thread.
Mom, breakfast is ready. There's millet porridge, steamed buns, and pickles. Are you and Dad up yet?
I'm up and will be there soon. Your dad said it's cold today, so make sure to dress the child warmly.

Sister, Sister Zheng from the community will come to our home this morning to discuss the handicraft corner. Didn’t you say last time that you also wanted to learn more about it? Would you like to come and listen together?
Sister Shufen, I'm heading to the supermarket now to pick up the fabric. I'll be there in about three to five minutes.
Mom, I made scallion pancakes this morning, which you love. Would you like to come over for lunch and have some together? You can also see Xinxin while you're here.
Hello Teacher Han, I will pick up Yuxin after school this afternoon and go directly home, so I won't linger at the kindergarten entrance. I just wanted to let you know.

Dear Sister Zheng, this is Ma Xiulan. Regarding the position of community handicraft corner instructor, I have given it careful thought and am truly honored to accept the invitation. I will arrive punctually at 2 p.m. on Wednesday at the activity center. May I ask if there is a projector available in the activity room? Additionally, will basic fabrics, needles, and thread be provided by the community, or should participants bring their own? Thank you!

Sister Zheng, I have a preliminary idea for the teaching process: first, briefly introduce the culture of embroidery (5 minutes), then familiarize participants with the tools (embroidery hoop, needle, thread), followed by a focus on teaching the satin stitch technique. Finally, participants will practice on prepared heart or leaf patterns. What do you think of this arrangement?

Additionally, I have prepared materials for 10 participants, including pre-cut cotton fabric, embroidery thread, needles, and embroidery hoops. The fabric features simple patterns of hearts and leaves. I will arrive a bit early on Wednesday to set up.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan has a slight cough today. Please keep an eye on him. Thank you.
Good morning, Mom. It's colder today, so please remember to put on more clothes when you and Dad go out, and don't catch a cold.
Master Liu, the area under the kitchen sink has been cleaned up on my end. About what time can you come over?
Honey, plumber Master Liu is fixing the water pipes at home. Will you be back for lunch at noon?
Sister, I fixed the water pipe this morning. Has the specific time for the community handicraft class you mentioned last time been finalized?
Xinxin, Mom is already at the kindergarten gate. You'll see me as soon as you come out. I brought you a little cotton-padded jacket today, so remember to put it on when you come out.
Sister Zheng, I have prepared all the materials for tomorrow morning's handicraft class. The small biscuits and cotton fabric scraps have been sorted and packed separately. Please rest assured.
Honey, I'm still a bit nervous about my class tomorrow. Could you help me go over my opening remarks tonight if you have time?
Hello Teacher Han, I have prepared all the materials for this afternoon's community handicraft class. Do you have any students who need to be added to the class at the last minute?
Mom, my handicraft class in the community this afternoon was a great success. Everyone praised my teaching, and I felt really happy! I'll tell you all about it in detail during dinner tonight.

Elder Sister, the community handicraft class has concluded for today, and it was very successful. All the students enjoyed it very much. How have you been feeling lately? As the weather is getting colder, please take extra care to stay warm.

Sister Xiuqin, I was weaving a safety knot tonight using navy and dark green threads, planning to make a car keychain for Zhiqiang. Regarding the weaving method you mentioned last time, how should the thread ends be handled at the finishing stage to make it more secure?

When finishing, thread the loose end through the adjacent knots, passing it through several strands. Then lightly singe the end with a lighter and press it flat. This method is both secure and aesthetically pleasing. Your hands are truly skillful—Zhiqiang is fortunate.

Chunmei, are you asleep? I'm a bit tired from tutoring my child with homework today, and it reminded me of the days when we used to do homework together as kids. How is your son doing with his studies lately?

Sister Zheng, thank you so much for your help at the market this morning! I have already contacted the insurance agent Xiao Wang you recommended, and we have scheduled a meeting at the community service center tomorrow at 10 a.m. You have been a great help, and I would like to treat you to tea sometime!

You're welcome, Xiulan. I'm glad I could help. Xiao Wang is quite professional. Remember to bring Zhiqiang's driver's license and ID card with you tomorrow and have a good talk with him. Feel free to ask me if you have any questions.
Sister Shufen, I just bought some tea from your shop. My childhood friend Chunmei is coming over for tea tomorrow, so it's perfect timing. Thank you!

Honey, I'm at the community park with Xinxin, and she's having a great time on the slide. I'm also taking the chance to look into the distance, which feels much more relaxing for my eyes. Please drive safely on the road.
I: Zhiqiang, I've steamed a sea bass, stir-fried some broccoli, and made seaweed egg drop soup for dinner tonight. I'll wait for you to come back to eat. Please be careful on your way home.
Mom, Xuanxuan and Zhezhe both went to school smoothly today, and Xinxin was also dropped off at kindergarten. How are you and Dad feeling today? The weather is cold, so please keep warm.
Chunmei, come to my house for tea this afternoon. I've just tidied up the living room and brewed your favorite jasmine tea.
By the way, I recently finished embroidering that piece 'Maggie on Plum Blossom.' I'd like to show it to you and hear your thoughts.
Xiulan, I will arrive at your place around 2:30 p.m. Is that convenient? I'll bring some of the date cakes I made.
Chunmei, come to my house for tea at 2:30 p.m. I have a new embroidery pattern to show you.
Zhiqiang, dinner is at 7 o'clock. I've made your favorite braised hairtail. Come home early after work.

【Ping An Insurance】Dear customer, your insurance policy (Policy No. PA202501110123) has been successfully archived. If you need to inquire or schedule a service, please reply with "Appointment". Wishing you a pleasant life!

Sister Xiuqin, I just finished weaving a peace knot lanyard tonight, and I'm quite satisfied with how I concealed the thread ends. You mentioned last time that you wanted to learn. How about coming to my place another day so I can teach you?

Dear Teacher Han, 

This is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to confirm with you whether the math homework for this weekend is pages 35-36 in the workbook. My child mentioned being a bit unsure, so I appreciate your help.
Yes, it's all the exercises on pages 35-36. Also, remind Mingxuan not to forget to preview the first two sections of the next chapter.

Sister Xiuqin, I tried the layered needle technique you taught in the video just now, and it really feels much smoother—the fish scales look much more even now! Thank you so much! Once this "Abundance Year After Year" embroidery is finished, you'll be the first one I invite to appreciate it.

Sister Xiuqin, I've completed the preliminary outline for the "Fu" character embroidery pattern for next week's handicraft corner. It should look quite nice with gold thread. How is your preparation coming along?
Honey, Xuanxuan took the bus to school by himself. I'll be back after dropping off Zhe Zhe and Xinxin.
How have you been lately, elder sister? I've recently saved up some education funds for Xuanxuan and wanted to ask which bank you used to deposit money for your niece before.

Honey, I just went to ICBC and set up an education savings account for Xuanxuan. It's a three-year term, and I deposited 500 yuan as the initial amount. I've kept the deposit receipt safe and will show it to you tonight.

Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to confirm with you regarding the math review materials you mentioned at the last parent-teacher meeting. Should they be purchased collectively, or do parents need to print them out themselves? Sorry to bother you.

【Agricultural Bank of China】Dear customer, a time deposit of 500.00 yuan was successfully made to your account ending with XXXX on January 15, 2025, at 08:45. The deposit term is 1 year, with an estimated interest of approximately XX yuan upon maturity. For details, please log in to the mobile banking app or visit a branch for inquiry.
Mom, we steamed a sea bass for dinner tonight, and the kids really enjoyed it. Have you and Dad eaten yet?
Honey, I've taken the kids to school. Your breakfast is warming in the pot, remember to eat it. If your back still hurts, the medicine is in the bedside table drawer.
Mom, Zhiqiang is resting at home today. I went to the market to buy groceries in the morning and tidied up the house in the afternoon. How are you and Dad doing?
Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. Mingxuan took the bus to school by himself today and should have already arrived. I would appreciate it if you could keep an eye on him.

【Jinghai Community】Dear residents, a warm reminder on fire prevention and theft prevention in winter: Please promptly clear clutter from corridors, check household electrical wiring, and ensure doors, windows, water, and electricity are secured when going out. Wishing you a pleasant life!
Sis, what did you have for lunch? I just finished eating with Zhiqiang. Cleaning the house has left me with an aching back. Have you started your pre-New Year deep cleaning yet?
Zhezhe, what did you have for lunch at school? Mom cleaned your room this morning and found some old toys and books. Let me know which ones you still want to keep when you come back tonight.

Sister Shufen, I just got back from your place. Thank you for keeping an eye out for handcraft work for me. The cleaning agent of that brand you mentioned works really well. I'll come to buy it from you again next time.

Mom, I just got back from dropping off the kids, and my back is a bit sore, so I'm going to rest for a while. It's colder today, so please make sure you and Dad wear more layers at home to avoid catching a chill. I'll go grocery shopping later and make braised pork ribs for dinner.

Sister Xiuqin, the check-in for tomorrow's market is at 8 a.m. at Booth B-12 in the New Year's Goods Market Area of Jinghai Cultural Square, right? I've noted it down. Let's meet at the bus stop at the entrance of our residential area at 7:30 tomorrow morning.
Mom, my back has been a bit uncomfortable again these past two days. Regarding the hot compress remedy you mentioned last time, how many slices of ginger should be added to the mugwort specifically?

Xiulan, last time you mentioned the grout between your bathroom tiles had turned black. I bought a new bottle of mold removal gel that works exceptionally well. Would you like me to bring it over this afternoon?
Honey, I'm going to pick up Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin later, and I'll stop by Shufen Supermarket to buy laundry detergent. Do we need anything else from home?
Mingxuan, have you finished your math homework for today? I'll help you check it once I'm done cleaning the kitchen. Please mark any questions you find difficult.
Mom, I can't figure out how to draw the auxiliary line for this geometry problem. I'll wait for you to come and take a look.

Sister, the children have all finished their homework quite well today, and the whole family is watching TV now. I'm almost done with the new embroidery pattern you recommended last time, and I'll bring it to show you tomorrow.
Sister Xiuqin, I've already arrived at the bus stop at the east gate of the residential area. Have you set off yet?
I: Honey, I've gotten on the bus and should be home around 5:30. The market went quite smoothly today—I made 158 yuan. How's the traffic on your end?

Ma Zhiqiang: Honey, you've worked hard. I just got off the expressway, and everything went smoothly. You should rest a bit when you get home, and don't make anything too complicated for dinner tonight.
I: Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, Xinxin, we've finished eating. Let's tidy up the living room together. Put the toys back in the box and the books back on the shelf. Mom will go do the dishes.
Ma Mingxuan: All right, Mom. My younger brother, sister, and I will tidy up right away.
Ma Zhiqiang: Honey, I've arrived and settled in. Everything is fine. Are the kids asleep already? You should rest early too, don't overwork yourself.
Mom, my back is a bit uncomfortable. I got up a little late today and just finished making breakfast for the kids. Have you and Dad eaten yet?
Xiulan: Big sister, I was a bit tired from setting up the stall yesterday, and my back isn't feeling too well. The children are all doing fine. How have you been recently?

Hello Sister Zheng, this is Xiulan. I wanted to ask if there have been any opportunities for handicraft work or temporary markets in the community or nearby recently? I'm hoping to save more for the children's tuition fees. I would appreciate it if you could keep an eye out for any such opportunities. Thank you!

Aunt Sun, I'll be coming over to buy groceries around 9:30 today. Could you please set aside two jin of good-quality minced pork from the front leg, along with some fresh tomatoes and green vegetables? Thank you!
Sister Zheng: Xiulan, I just asked around, and there are no suitable jobs available for now. Don't worry, I'll help you inquire more and let you know as soon as there's any news.
Thank you so much, Sister Zheng! I truly appreciate your efforts. Please keep me updated whenever there's any news.
Mom, I made tomato and egg noodles for lunch, and the kids all loved them. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Xiulan: We had dumplings. Is your back still hurting? Don't overwork yourself this afternoon; take more breaks.

Sister Xiuqin, I spent the afternoon at home with the children making Spring Festival window decorations and embroidering the character "Fu." The children were so happy. Have you come up with any new ideas recently?
Honey, I made minced pork with tofu and stir-fried vegetables for dinner. The kids loved it. Where are you on your route? Have you eaten yet?
I just had a bowl of noodles at the service area and am about to set off. Thank you for your hard work at home. I'll try to come back as early as possible tonight.

Sister Xiuqin, I have finished counting the remaining embroidery pieces from the market. There are two peony designs and one magpie on a plum branch. Also, regarding the custom "福" character pendant we discussed last time, I have sketched a few drafts. When will you have time to come over to my place and take a look?

Mom, I'm going to the market later to buy pork ribs and tofu to make soup for dinner. Is your back still hurting recently? I bought some medicated plasters yesterday and will bring a couple over for you later.

Mom, I've stewed some braised pork ribs for dinner, and also stir-fried mushrooms with tofu and garlic chives with eggs. I've prepared quite a few dishes. If you and Dad haven't cooked tonight, why not come over and join me for dinner?
Honey, dinner is almost ready. We have braised pork ribs, mushroom tofu, and scrambled eggs with garlic chives. The rice is also steamed. About what time will you be home?
Auntie Sun, I just got home from grocery shopping. The tenderloin from your place is really fresh. Thank you for your concern about my back—I’ll rest for a bit and feel better soon.

Sister Xiuqin, good afternoon. I just finished the housework and saw the patterns you shared. The color scheme of that peony is really beautiful; I'll give it a try later. By the way, regarding the order we discussed last time, I'll take some time to sketch a draft tonight and send it to you tomorrow for review.
Zhe Zhe, Mom is about to head out. Wait for me at the school gate after school, and don’t wander off.
【XX Bank】Dear customer, a transaction of 38.50 yuan was made with your savings card ending in 8899 at Shufen Supermarket on the 21st at 16:30.

Hello, Sister Zheng. I was tidying up the house today and sorted through the accumulated order ideas. Regarding the draft design for the custom tapestry featuring peonies, carp, and lotus flowers, I have sketched a preliminary plan tonight. Would it be convenient for you to review it tomorrow when you have time?

Honey, I bought some laundry detergent on sale today, which was quite a good deal. The kids and I had shredded pork with green peppers and cabbage for dinner, and everything was fine. Remember to eat even if you're working overtime. My back was a bit sore today, but soaking my feet made it much better.
Mom, my chronic lower back pain has flared up again. It was particularly sore when I woke up this morning. Do you still have that medicated plaster you mentioned last time?
Honey, after dropping off the kid today, I stopped by to buy some groceries on the way back. We'll just have some noodles for lunch. About what time will you be home tonight?
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan stayed up quite late reviewing last night, so he might be a bit tired today. Please kindly pay a little extra attention to his condition. Thank you!
Sister Xiuqin, I have prepared the fabric samples and needles and thread for this afternoon's community class. Have you finalized the list of participants on your end?

【Community Activity Center】Dear participants, the embroidery tutorial will commence promptly at 1:00 p.m. today in the Handicraft Corner. Please bring the material kits distributed last time. Instructor: Ms. Ma Xiulan.
Mom, my back is hurting badly. I was moving slowly this morning, so Zhiqiang helped make breakfast. Please take good care of yourselves, both you and Dad, and don't overexert yourselves.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan went to school by himself today and should have already arrived. Please keep an eye out for him. Thank you.

Sister Xiuqin, I've made a rough sketch of the 'Magpie on Plum Blossom' pattern we discussed last time. Could you take a look at the layout and color scheme? My back has been hurting badly, so I can only work on it slowly.

Dr. Wang, this is Ma Xiulan, who came to see you this morning for my back pain. I have applied the medicated plaster you prescribed, and it feels much cooler and more comfortable. Thank you for your advice—I will make sure to get plenty of rest.

Zhiqiang, I have a backache. I've already prepared and washed the vegetables for dinner, and the meat has been taken out to thaw. Could you help stir-fry them when you come back in the evening? I'll guide you while sitting down.

Mingxuan, on your way home from school, please stop by the supermarket at the entrance of the residential area and buy a bottle of light soy sauce. We'll need it for stir-frying tonight. Be careful on the way.

Sister Wang, thank you so much for picking up Xinxin from school on your way again today! I had to see a doctor for my back discomfort and just got back. Let Zhiqiang bring some fruits over to thank you another day.

Mom, I went to the community clinic today. The doctor said it's a lumbar muscle strain and insisted that I get plenty of rest. Zhiqiang and the kids are very considerate—they're all eager to help with the chores. You and Dad should also take good care of yourselves and avoid overexertion.

Ma Xiulan: Dad, Mom, just to confirm with you, we'll be coming over at 4 p.m. on New Year's Eve. I'll bring braised beef and fried meatballs for the reunion dinner. Is there anything else you'd like me to prepare?
Ma Xiulan: Sister, my back pain has improved a bit. I'm resting at home today. How are your New Year preparations going on your end?

Ma Xiulan: Dear, I applied a hot compress at noon and I'm feeling a bit better. On your way home this evening, could you stop by Aunt Sun's place to buy some green vegetables? We're running low on leafy greens at home.

Ma Xiulan: Auntie Wu, regarding the batch of embroidery threads you mentioned last time, I have basically finalized the color scheme. I need two strands each in the red and gold color families. Would it be convenient for you to set them aside for me today?
Aunt Wu: Xiulan, I've kept all the threads for you. By the way, how is your back? Once the draft is finalized, send it to me for review, and I'll help you check it over.

Mom, I plan to make scrambled eggs with tomatoes and a tofu and bok choy stew for dinner. Do you think we need to add any other dishes? Or is there any seasoning missing at home that I can pick up on the way?
Honey, dinner will be ready around six o'clock. Please be careful on your way home from work.
Zhiqiang, have you arrived at the market? Don't forget to buy some fresh tomatoes and eggs, as I plan to make noodles for lunch. Also, check if there is any bok choy and buy some while you're at it.
Shufen, are you up from your lunch break? Are you free this afternoon? I'd like to invite you for a walk and a chat at Jingwen Park at three o'clock.
Zhiqiang, will your procurement team be back soon? Have you bought the pork ribs and vegetables? I'm about to start cooking here.
Aunt Sun, I'll come to buy meat around 2:30 this afternoon. Please keep some pork belly and a young rooster for me. Thank you!
Auntie Sun, do you still have fresh lamb rolls today? I plan to arrive at the store around 16:15 and would like to buy some hot pot base and meatballs.

Shufen, I've bought quite a few things and can't carry them all. If it's convenient for you, could you please help me deliver them later with your electric bike? I'll leave the items at your shop first.
Sister Xiuqin, I revised the embroidery sketch from last time this evening and softened the color of the peonies. Would you like me to bring it for you to see during tomorrow's handicraft class?

Chunmei, I ran into Sister Wang at the market today. We talked about the hot compress recipe for the waist you mentioned last time. She tried it and said it worked quite well, so she asked me to thank you as well.

Xiulan: Good morning, Sister Xiuqin! I've just finished preparing breakfast, and my back feels much better, thanks to your hot compress remedy. Regarding the community craft market booth, I'm all set on my end. Has the time and location been confirmed?
Ma Xiulan: Mom, I just dropped off Yuxin and Mingzhe at school, and they both went in smoothly. It's cold today, so you and Dad should stay warm at home, and don't let the stove go out.
Xiulan, I'll be leaving early for work tomorrow. Please remember to turn over the sausages on the balcony again, and make sure they aren't directly exposed to the sun.

Hello, the corner floral pattern on your custom embroidery has been changed from blue to light purple as requested, and the stitches have been smoothed out. It will be washed and ironed tomorrow morning before shipping, with an estimated delivery the day after tomorrow. Thank you for your patience.

Mom, I've just finished taking stock of the ingredients for the New Year's Eve dinner. We're a bit short on scallions, ginger, and drinks, so I'll go buy them at Haixinyuan later. Is there anything else we need at home? I can get it all together.
Alright, just buy whatever you think is best. Take your time on the way, and don’t buy too much—we won’t be able to finish it all.
Dear Sister Xiuqin, Happy New Year! Wishing you and your family a joyful Spring Festival, good health, and all the best in everything!

【China Mobile】Dear customer, your current account balance is 58.23 yuan, with 3.2GB of data remaining. On the occasion of the Lunar New Year's Eve, China Mobile wishes you and your family a joyful celebration and great prosperity in the Year of the Dragon!
Mom, how was the New Year's Eve dinner? We just finished cleaning up and are about to watch the Spring Festival Gala. Is everything good on your end?

Xiulan, we've just finished eating and are about to watch the Spring Festival Gala. Did your family have a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner? Wishing your whole family a happy New Year and a joyful time staying up late on New Year's Eve!

【China Mobile】Dear Customer, Happy Chinese New Year! Thank you for your support over the past year. From New Year's Eve to the third day of the Lunar New Year (January 28th-31st), you can claim 10GB of free domestic data. Simply reply with "New Year Data" to activate the offer. Wishing you a joyful family reunion and great fortune in the Year of the Dragon!
Big sister, Happy New Year! I stayed up late last night for the New Year's Eve vigil, and today my back feels much better. Is the New Year celebration lively over there?
Mom, we've finished breakfast and will probably set off to your place around ten o'clock. Have you and Dad already eaten?
Xiulan: We've all eaten. Your dad just came back from his evening walk. No rush, drive carefully on the way. We'll wait for you.
Sister, Happy New Year! Sending New Year's greetings to you and brother-in-law! How are the kids? I just sent you a video call but you didn't answer, are you busy?

【Jinghai Community】Dear Counselor Ms. Ma Xiulan, your transportation material subsidy of 200 yuan for the handicraft corner in January has been issued. Please check your account. Wishing you a joyful Spring Festival and a happy family!
Chunmei, Happy New Year! Our whole family is celebrating the New Year at my parents' place. Where are you spending the New Year this year?
Sister Xiulan, Happy New Year! We're at my mother-in-law's place, and it's quite lively here. Let's get together when we have time, and I'll show you the new crocheted cup sleeve I made.
Fen'er, have you arrived at Mom and Dad's house? We just got here a little while ago, and Mom and Dad are so happy. When will you be able to come over?

Teacher Han, Happy New Year! This is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to extend my New Year greetings to you. Thank you for taking care of Mingxuan last semester. Wishing you a joyful Spring Festival and all the best!
Sister Xiuqin, I have good news to share with you—our community handicraft corner has secured a subsidy! I’ll give you the details when I get back.
Auntie Sun, are the pork tenderloin and apples still fresh today? I'll come by around 4:30 to buy some. Could you please save a portion for me?
Shufen, I'm about to head out and will arrive at the gate of Jingwen Park around 17:15. The weather is nice today, so we can take a couple more laps.
Honey, I'm almost back from my walk. Did you start cooking the rice? I'll stir-fry the dishes as soon as I get home, and we'll have dinner around 6:20.
The food is cooked and still simmering. Xuanxuan is almost done with his homework. We'll have dinner when you get back.
Sister, the kids are starting school tomorrow. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe's winter vacation homework has finally been checked. How is your little treasure's homework coming along?
Good morning, Mom! I've just prepared breakfast. The millet porridge and steamed buns are still warm. Are you and Dad up yet?
Xiulan, this is Sister Wang. I made some three-delicacy dumplings yesterday and would like to bring some over for your family to try.

Sister, I have counted all the red envelopes for the children, totaling 1,800, and recorded them in the notebook. How much did you give Xuanxuan and Zhezhe for their red envelopes? Let me double-check.
【XX Bank】Dear customer, your account ending with 1234 received a transfer deposit of RMB 500.00 at 09:45. The current balance is XXXX.XX yuan.
Xiulan, is your back feeling better? How did the medicated plaster I mentioned last time work for you?
Honey, I stir-fried spinach and scrambled eggs with tomatoes for lunch. The rice is being kept warm in the pot. You can eat directly when you come back.

Sister Xiuqin, I just bought some new embroidery threads from Qiaoshou Workshop. The colors are particularly vibrant, perfect for teaching everyone to embroider the character "Fu" at the handicraft corner next week. Do you need me to bring any materials for you?
Mom, I'm making braised pork and vinegar-glazed cabbage tonight. The rice is also cooking. We'll have dinner around six o'clock, so you can eat as soon as you get home.
Mingxuan, there is an issue with the solution steps for the final problem on your math test. I have circled it, and we can review it together after dinner.
Zhezhe, the knee area of your school uniform pants has become a bit worn thin. I'll find time to mend it for you tomorrow. Please wear another pair for now.

【Industrial and Commercial Bank of China】Dear customer, your savings card ending with 8899 received a transfer deposit of 500.00 yuan at 21:50 on February 1. The current available balance is 12,345.67 yuan. Friendly reminder: The business hours of our Jinghai Sub-branch are from 8:30 to 17:00.
contactName: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

message_content: Mom, did you sleep well last night? The weather is nice today. Please remember to dress warmly when you and Dad go out for a walk.

Sister Xiuqin, good weekend. I found the embroidery thread you mentioned last time while sorting through materials today. The color is very authentic, and I can bring it to show you in next week's handicraft class.
【Jinghai Community】Dear residents, there will be a 'Handicrafts for Spring' workshop at the community activity center at 2:00 PM this Wednesday. You are welcome to sign up. Reply TD to unsubscribe.

Mom, I tidied up the yard this afternoon, cut some fruit for the kids, and made some red date tea. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe are playing in the living room, and Xinxin has had some water too. How are things on your end?

Zhe Zhe, I saw you were having a good time playing just now, but don’t forget we need to check your handwriting practice book after dinner. For now, you can start thinking about any homework questions you might have.

Sister, we just finished dinner and talked about the children's studies and plans for next week. Have you eaten? The weather has been cold lately, so please take good care of yourself and Brother-in-Law.
Mingxuan, after dinner, Mom needs to tidy up the kitchen. Please organize your homework by yourself first, and I will check it in a while. Focus on reviewing the progress in math and English.

Zhe Zhe, I've reviewed your handwriting practice book. The right-falling stroke in the character "永" should be more extended. Please carefully rewrite each of the characters I've circled three more times, and show them to me when you're done.
Sister Zheng, I saw the notice for the handicraft class in the community group. The time is 2 p.m. next Wednesday, right? I've noted it down and will be there on time.
Mom, I've dropped off the kids and just bought eggs and tissues from the convenience store. What are you and Dad having for lunch today? I'll come over to see you this afternoon.

Chunmei, let's meet at the entrance of the Taian Shengshijun Vegetable Market at 2 p.m. on Thursday. It's been a long time since we last met, and I'd like to treat you to that newly opened lamb soup restaurant!
Xinxin, Mom is going to the market to buy groceries now. I will pick you up from the kindergarten around 11:10. Please wait for me in the classroom.
Sister Wang, I've cleaned the dustpan. I'll bring it over to you after I take Xinxin back to kindergarten.

Ms. Zheng, I have received your order for the "Year after Year of Abundance" coasters. Completing 10 pairs within three days is no problem. I will confirm the specific dimensions and fabric color requirements with you again.

Alright, the size is 20*20 centimeters, with a red base fabric paired with gold thread, which carries auspicious symbolism. You can bring the fabric over this afternoon; I have enough embroidery thread here.
Mom, I'm going to teach a handicraft class at the community center tomorrow, and I'm a bit nervous. Do you think I've prepared enough materials?
Honey, if the school sends a notice about the parent-teacher conference for our eldest son, please let me know as soon as possible.

【Jinghai Community Handicraft Corner】Hello, Teacher Ma. We have received the teaching materials list you submitted for tomorrow, and it has been confirmed as correct. Please arrive at the community activity center promptly at 9:00 AM tomorrow.
Sister, I bought some fresh pork liver at the market today. I remember you mentioned last time that you have anemia. Shall I bring some over to you this evening?
Sister Wang, I really enjoyed the tea and conversation at your place today. Thank you for the mung bean cakes and jasmine tea. Please come visit my home another day.
Mom, I've finished hanging the laundry this afternoon and am now heading out to pick up the kids from school. The electric scooter has enough battery, so don't worry.

Sister, the children have been quite well-behaved today. Regarding the folk remedy for cough you mentioned last time, what specific herbs are included? Mingxuan has been coughing a bit these past two days.
Zhe Zhe, have you finished your math homework? Remember to check it yourself after you're done, and wait for Dad to come back to help you look it over.
Xinxin, the painting you drew today is really beautiful! Mom has put it away for you. How about drawing a new one tomorrow?
Honey, are you going straight to the office after dropping off Xuanxuan? I've checked Zhe Zhe's homework, and it's all packed in his schoolbag.
Xinxin, Mom will be at the kindergarten gate soon. Please pack your little backpack and wait.
Zhezhe, have you arrived at school? Remember to place your water bottle next to your desk and drink plenty of water.
Mom, there's a handicraft class in the community this afternoon, and I'm a bit nervous. Are you free? I'd like to talk with you for a moment.
Auntie Sun, I'll be at the market in about ten minutes. Could you please save three fresh tomatoes and a bunch of baby bok choy for me? Thank you!
Xinxin, Mom's noodles will be ready soon. Remember to drink some water after your nap. We'll rest for a while after the meal.

Sister Xiuqin, thank you for accompanying me back today. I really enjoyed our conversation along the way. The tips you shared on how to communicate with learners of different ages were particularly helpful. I feel much more confident about my next teaching session now.

Sister Zheng, today's community handicraft class has ended, and everyone learned very attentively. I have recorded the material consumption: the navy blue and red embroidery threads are running low. When would be convenient for you? I would like to request some more from you.
Zhiqiang, please drive slowly and pay attention to safety on the road. Have you checked all the things you need to bring for the business trip?
Mingxuan, the temperature has dropped today. Please wear an extra sweater under your school uniform jacket to avoid catching a cold.
Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. Mingxuan has a bit of a cough today. Could you please remind him to drink more warm water? Thank you!
Mom, I'm up. It's cold today, so you and Dad should dress warmly when you go out to avoid catching a chill.

Sister Wang, I tried making the Chinese knot again at home after learning it at the community handicraft corner yesterday, but the final step of finishing it still feels a bit loose. Would you have time this afternoon to show me again?
Chunmei, last time you mentioned wanting to learn how to make tomato sauce noodles. I happen to be making them for lunch today—would you like me to take photos of the steps for you?

Teacher Yang, Zhe Zhe forgot to bring his colored markers today, and he said he needs them for the art class this afternoon. I will deliver them to him at noon, arriving at the school gate around 12:30. Could you please let him know? Thank you!

Honey, I'm planning to make sweet and sour pork tenderloin and noodles with gravy for dinner tonight to celebrate setting up the education fund today. Please come home early after work. The kids will be back from school soon.

Dear Ms. Zheng,  

I have started the trial embroidery for the order of 20 pairs of coasters we discussed this morning. I selected navy blue and light gold threads, and the effect is quite good. I would like to confirm with you whether the client has any specific preferences for the color scheme of the interlocking floral pattern. Additionally, the material inventory is sufficient, and a one-week production timeline is feasible.
【Tianjin Weather】Tonight to tomorrow daytime in Jinghai District: clear turning cloudy, north wind force 3-4, temperature -2℃~7℃, air quality good.
Mom, I've checked Mingzhe and Yuxin's homework, and they both did it quite diligently. The last question on Xuanxuan's math paper was a bit difficult, so I explained it to him. Don't worry.

Xiulan, I will go to Jinghai Hospital tomorrow morning to pick up medicine for Mom and should be back around ten o'clock. Please keep an eye on the children and make sure they finish their homework in the morning.

Sister Xiuqin, I have some good news to share with you! Sister Zheng from the community approached me today. She mentioned that the community is planning to start a skills training class and would like to invite me to serve as an embroidery teaching assistant, with compensation for the teaching hours! I think this is a great opportunity and would like to hear your opinion.
Mom, my shoulders are a bit tight this morning, probably because I slept in an awkward position last night. I made millet porridge and steamed buns for breakfast, and the kids are all up now.
Xiulan, I understand. Get more exercise. Don't overexert yourself with breakfast; let the children serve themselves. Chunmei is coming this afternoon. Are there enough refreshments at home?
Chunmei, I've already brewed the tea—jasmine tea—and prepared your favorite mung bean cakes and fried dough twists. We're just waiting for you to arrive.

【Jinghai Community Supermarket】Dear members, this Saturday (February 8) is Member Day. Selected fresh produce and daily necessities will be available at a 20% discount. For more details, please check the APP.
Mom, I stir-fried shredded potatoes and garlic rapeseed for dinner, and also reheated the leftovers from yesterday. The rice is cooked as well. What time will you be home approximately?

Mom, I went to Jinzhongzi this morning to buy seeds for spring sowing, and I also stopped by the vegetable market to buy groceries. How have you and Dad been lately? The weather is still cold, so please take care and keep warm.

Sister Xiuqin, I finally mastered the seed stitch technique today! The little fruits I embroidered look particularly plump and three-dimensional—it's so rewarding. When you have time, let's meet up and chat in detail. I'll treat you to tea and seek your advice on color matching.
Mom, today was the children's first day of school. I got up early and made millet porridge and boiled eggs, and they enjoyed the meal very much. Have you and Dad had breakfast yet?
Honey, the fog is heavy on the road, so please drive slowly when taking Xuanxuan to school. I will head home after dropping off Zhe Zhe and Xinxin.
Hello Teacher Han, today is Mingxuan's first day of the new semester. Please give him extra attention. He has completed all his winter vacation homework, and it is in his schoolbag.
Xinxin, Mom is coming to pick you up now. Please wait for me at the kindergarten.
【Haixinyuan Supermarket】Dear member, the Lu Hua soy sauce and Zhong Yan salt you frequently purchase are on special offer today. Welcome to make your selection. Reply TD to unsubscribe.

Chunmei, it was such a pleasure running into you at the market today! I heard from you that Hualian has a discount on eggs, so I’ll go check it out later. How have you been lately? Let’s have tea together when you’re free.

Sister Xiuqin, I just finished tutoring the kids with their homework. Today's progress on the handicraft is good—I completed the seed embroidery for two coasters. I've noted down the agricultural supplies store you recommended. Thank you!
Dear Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to know about my child's first day at school. He came back looking very happy, and I appreciate your care. Thank you.
I: Honey, I've safely dropped Xuanxuan and Zhezhe off at school, and Xinxin is also at kindergarten. Everything went smoothly. Drive safely.

Sister Xiuqin, for the handcraft corner teaching session the day after tomorrow, I have prepared some embroidery threads and practice fabric pieces, and I also embroidered a pattern sample. Do you have enough materials on your side? Would you like me to bring extra large needles and needle threaders?

Aunt Wu, for my work at the April temple fair market, I have chosen the "Year after Year of Abundance" pattern and already transferred it onto the fabric. With your extensive experience, what do you think of this theme?

Sister Zheng, thank you for introducing the work at the handicraft corner. I have prepared everything for the teaching session the day after tomorrow. Would you like to come and take a look when you have time?
Hello Teacher Yang, this is Ma Mingzhe's mother. I will pick him up at the school gate around 16:40 after school today. Thank you for your trouble.
Honey, Mingzhe had trouble with a math problem, so I helped him with it. Yuxin made progress in recognizing pinyin today. Have you finished watching the news?
Fen'er, let's have a video call around 9:30 p.m. to talk about our parents' health and matters at your store.
Mom, I was tidying up at home this morning and remembered you mentioned last time that your waist was a bit uncomfortable. Has the lumbar support I bought for you arrived? How does it feel to use it?
Sister Zhou, I have prepared all the teaching materials for the backstitch embroidery class this afternoon. Approximately what time will you arrive at the activity center?

Sister Wang, don't forget to bring your reading glasses to the handicraft class this afternoon. The leaf pattern we're embroidering today has many details, so the glasses will help you see more clearly.

【Jinghai Community Activity Center】Dear participants, the handicraft corner class (backstitch embroidery tutorial) will begin at 14:00 this afternoon. Please arrive on time. For inquiries, please call: 022-68681234.

Sister Xiulan, your teaching at the handicraft corner today was excellent—I finally got the hang of the backstitch embroidery! I'm really looking forward to setting up a stall at the temple fair. Let's discuss the details carefully for our next activity, and I'll also think about what small crafts I can make when I get back.
Mom, I've picked up Mingzhe and Yuxin, and we're on our way home. For dinner, I've prepared spinach and tofu soup and sweet and sour cabbage. We'll probably eat around six-thirty.
Mom, I'm going to Mingxuan's parent-teacher conference this afternoon. How have you been feeling lately? Is everything at home going well?
Sister Xiuqin, my embroidery piece for the temple fair is finally finished today! I took a photo to show you—it looks pretty good, I think.
Shufen, hello. I wanted to ask if you still have the Chinese tutoring books your child used during middle school. My son Mingxuan is looking for some study materials to review.
Great! Thank you, Shufen. I'll come to pick it up from you tomorrow morning. Sorry for the trouble.

Mom, let's keep it simple for lunch. Brother Zhao and his family are coming over for dinner, and I've prepared quite a few dishes. Zhe Zhe has gone to buy drinks. If you and Dad are free tonight, why not join us and make it livelier?

【Shufen Convenience Store】Dear member, the reference book "Five-Year College Entrance Examination, Three-Year Simulation" you pre-ordered has arrived. Please collect it in-store by 21:00 today using pickup code 1234.
Brother Zhao, the dishes are all prepared, we're just waiting for you. Please drive safely on the way, and come directly to our home.
Ms. Wang, it was such a pleasant coincidence to run into you during my walk just now. Your little dog is absolutely adorable. Let's take a stroll together sometime when you're free.
Mom, the scallion pancakes for breakfast today were really delicious! I'd like to go play soccer with Zhe Zhe in the neighborhood for a while later, is that okay?
Zhezhe, help Mom peel a few cloves of garlic. We'll need them for stir-frying at noon.
Xiulan, do you have any of the mung bean cakes you made yesterday left? My mother-in-law tried them and said they were excellent. She would like to ask how you made them.
Xinxin, it's time for your afternoon nap. After you wake up, I'll cut some fruit for you.
Xinxin, Mom is on her way to pick you up now and will arrive at the kindergarten gate in about ten minutes. Please pack your things and wait for me.

Honey, Zhe Zhe has a fever. I just took his temperature and it's 37.8°C, and his throat hurts. I've made some millet porridge. Please be careful on your way to work. I'll take him to see the doctor this morning.

Mom, Zhe Zhe had a fever this morning, 37.8 degrees Celsius. I will take him to the community hospital this morning. How have you and Dad been lately? The weather hasn't been good, so please stay warm.
Hello Dr. Wang, this is Ma Mingzhe's mother. The child has a fever of 37.8 degrees Celsius and a sore throat this morning. We will arrive at the clinic in about half an hour. Thank you for your help.
Sister, Zhe Zhe has a slight fever. I just took him back from the community hospital, and the doctor said it's just a common cold. Have you been busy lately?

Honey, Zhe Zhe has seen the doctor and was diagnosed with viral flu. Medicine has been prescribed. I made him tomato and egg noodles for lunch, and he also had some canned yellow peaches. He seems a bit more energetic now. What did you have for lunch?

Mom, Mingxuan is back from school. It's a bit colder today, so I told him to wear more tomorrow. Zhe Zhe is much better and drank most of a bowl of soup this evening. You and Dad should also keep warm.
Shufen, the canned yellow peaches you recommended yesterday were really good. Mingzhe's appetite improved a lot after eating them, and his fever has already subsided today. Thank you!
Mom, Mingzhe is much better today. I made him tomato and egg noodles for lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Sister Wang, I'll bring Mingzhe over right away. We should arrive in about ten minutes. Thank you for your trouble.
Sister Wang, our event has concluded. We are now on our way to pick up Mingzhe and should arrive in about ten minutes.
Shufen, I'm going to the supermarket later to buy some milk and dried noodles. Zhe Zhe has recovered from his illness, so I'll take the opportunity to chat with you.
Xiulan, that's great. It happens that a new batch of eggs just arrived today, and they're quite fresh. We'll be waiting for you.
Sister Wang, I was just at Shufen Supermarket. She mentioned the vegetable prices have been reasonable lately. Is there anything you need to buy? I can check for you.
Honey, I made millet porridge and steamed minced pork with Chinese yam and egg custard for dinner. Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin both said it was delicious. About what time will you be back?
Honey, I'll be a while longer with the deliveries here, probably not back until after eight. Go ahead and eat without waiting for me. Let the kids have more of the steamed egg custard.

Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan has completed all of his homework today and has also memorized the English assignments. Please pay a little extra attention to him tomorrow. Additionally, Zhe Zhe has recovered from his illness. Thank you for your concern.

Sister, Zhe Zhe has recovered from his illness and returned to school today, and the seedlings in the vegetable garden have also sprouted successfully, so I feel quite at ease. Is your back still hurting recently?
Mom, I'll clean up the kitchen after dinner. You should take a rest. I'll check Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin's homework later, so don't worry.
Hello Teacher Han, I am Ma Mingxuan's mother. Mingxuan has completed and corrected today's math homework. Thank you for your guidance.
Sister Wang, I've finished buying groceries and am now heading to your place to pick up the bamboo strips and sequins. I should arrive in about five minutes.
Okay, Xiulan, I've left everything for you on the shoe cabinet by the door. You can just take it directly. The door is unlocked.
Mom, we're planning to make steamed fish and broccoli for dinner. Would you and Dad like to come over to eat, or should we meet at the square before the activity?
Mom: Your dad and I will meet you at the square before the evening event. You two eat on your own, no need to bother with preparing anything for us.
Honey, the news today said it might rain after the Lantern Festival. Did you check if the windows on the balcony are properly closed?
Sis, I'm off tomorrow. You mentioned wanting to buy spring clothes last time. Would you like to go shopping together?

Dear Teacher Han, 

This is Ma Mingxuan's mother. Today, while guiding him in writing the essay "A Meaningful Thing," I encouraged him to focus on the details during the process of making a lantern, such as the scenes of his father assembling the frame and his younger sister drawing. He is currently adding these details. I would like to update you on the progress.
Sister Wang, we've arrived at the square. Have you gotten here yet? We're over by the lantern riddles.
【Xiachufang】 The "Sweet and Sour Pork Ribs" recipe you saved has been recreated by over 1,000 home cooks. Click to view the latest tips: https://dwz.cn/xxxx
Chunmei, my sister is coming over for dinner tomorrow, and I plan to make garlic vermicelli shrimp. Could you send me the sauce recipe you used last time? Thanks!
Fen, I'm almost at Wanda Plaza. Which gate are you at? I'll come directly to find you.
Sis, I'm at the Starbucks near the south gate. Take your time, no rush.

Mingxuan, have you finished checking your homework? If the math test needs to be signed, leave it on the table—I’ll take a look later. Make sure Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin also finish their assignments promptly.
Sister Xiuqin, I tried the peony petal embroidery technique you taught me last time this evening, but the transitions still don't look very natural. How many strands of thread did you use?

Use two strands of thread, and the silk thread should be split before use. Make the stitches denser in the transition areas, and you can add an extra layer of color. Could you take a picture and show me?
Hello Teacher Han, Mingzhe has a slight cough today. Could you please keep an eye on him? Thank you!
Mr. Yang, it seems that Mingzhe forgot to bring his math homework notebook. If it's needed during class, could you please let him know? I will bring it to him at noon.
Auntie Sun, I'll be passing by your stall later. Please save a bottle of aged vinegar and a pack of pickled mustard tuber for me. Thank you!
Xiulan, your peony embroidery is truly lifelike! The color scheme and stitching techniques are excellent—it will surely sell like hotcakes at the Saturday market!
My dear, your skills are getting better and better! These peonies look so lifelike, I can't help but adore them.
Thank you, Sister Xiuqin and Aunt Wu, for your encouragement! This is my first time embroidering such a large piece, so I was quite uncertain. Hearing you say that makes me feel much more at ease.
Sister Zheng, has the booth location and specific time for the Saturday market been confirmed? I have all the materials ready on my end.
Sister Wang, are you free this evening? I'd like to invite you for a walk and have a chat.
Xiulan, are you free? I happen to want to go for a walk too. What time and where shall we meet?
Honey, will you come back early for dinner after finishing your shift? I'm planning to make vegetable porridge.
Sister, have you tried the folk remedy for cough that I mentioned to you last time? How was the effect?
Mom, Xuanxuan said there's a math test this afternoon, so I put a chocolate bar in his backpack for an energy boost. The millet porridge you made this morning was really delicious.
Me: The kids' father, the children have all finished breakfast and gone to school. Xuanxuan has a test this afternoon, and I reminded him to take it seriously. What time will you be back tonight?

Good morning, Xiulan! The weather is nice today. Remember to drink a cup of warm water after your morning exercise. I sent you the link to the Baduanjin instructional video I bought yesterday on WeChat. Check it out to see if there are any new movements you can learn.

Good morning, Sister Ma! I just saw you at the school gate. Zhe Zhe is full of energy today. By the way, regarding the calligraphy class you asked about last time, I found out that it starts on Wednesday afternoon. Are you interested?
Xiulan, this is Aunt Sun. The newly arrived hawthorns today are particularly good, big and red. Didn't you say you wanted to buy some to make tea? I've saved a pound for you.

Xiulan, this is Xiuqin. I've crocheted a few new coaster patterns and have posted photos in the group chat. Please take a look to see if any are suitable for tomorrow's showcase. I can deliver them to you this afternoon.

I: Sister Xiuqin, I've seen the new patterns you shared, and the sunflower one is particularly beautiful! If it's convenient, could you bring two over this afternoon? I'd like to place them in the center of the display board.
Auntie Wu, for the community handicraft corner display tomorrow, you mentioned last time that you could lend me that small display stand. Would it be convenient for me to pick it up this afternoon?

【Jinghai District Agricultural Technology Extension Center】Dear trainee Ma Xiulan, you have successfully registered for the 'Free Spring Balcony Vegetable Planting Training Course'. The course will commence at 9:00 AM on March 5. Location: Meeting Room on the third floor of the Jinghai District Agricultural Service Center. Please bring your ID card and arrive on time. For further details, please contact: 022-68691234.
contactName: Jinghai District Agricultural Technology Extension Center

message_content: I: Mom, I forgot to mention on the phone that I signed up for a vegetable gardening training course to learn how to grow vegetables on the balcony. It's quite interesting. Also, remind Dad to take his blood pressure medication on time.

Xiulan, this is Sister Zheng from the community. I'm notifying you about a schedule change: the Handicraft Corner showcase tomorrow has been rescheduled to start at 10:00 AM. The location remains the same—the first floor of the Community Activity Center. I'm sending this message to ensure you don't make an unnecessary trip tomorrow.

Mingxuan, regarding the study plan discussed at the family meeting, please prepare a detailed timetable for reviewing each subject tonight. We will review it together tomorrow and post it next to the family agreement.
Mom, I have copied the convention and signed it. While Mingxuan is reviewing, I will take my sister to play in my room so as not to disturb him.

Sister Wang, I was so delighted to run into you on the road just now! The embroidery order from yesterday was successfully delivered, and the client was very satisfied. They even mentioned wanting to establish a long-term collaboration!

Sister Zheng, today's handicraft corner event was very successful. Thank you for your and the community's recognition. Regarding the handicraft section for the community market, I have some preliminary suggestions for potential locations. When would be a convenient time for us to discuss this in detail?

Okay, Sister Zheng, I think the theme "Thread in the Hands of a Loving Mother" for the Mother's Day embroidery event is excellent. I will start designing a few samples in the next couple of days and bring them to you next week for review.

Mingxuan, I've reviewed your math homework. The approach to the last major problem is a bit convoluted—I've circled it for you. Please take another look, and feel free to ask me anytime if you have any questions.
Mom: Xiulan, dinner is so sumptuous today. Seeing you happy makes us happy too. Is the kitchen almost tidied up?
Zhe Zhe, Xin Xin, stop playing now. It's time to go brush your teeth and wash your face to get ready for bed. Mom will come check on you in a little while.

Honey, I feel much more reassured after talking with you just now. I've thought it over about the money for the training class—we can save part of it and use the rest to buy some school supplies for the kids. What do you think?

【Jinghai District Agricultural Technology Extension Center】Dear trainee, you have successfully registered for the 'Spring Greenhouse Cultivation Techniques' training course. The class will start at 9:00 on March 5th, at the conference room on the third floor of the District Agricultural Technology Center. Please bring your ID card and a notebook. We wish you a pleasant learning experience!
contactName: Jinghai District Agricultural Technology Extension Center

message_content: Fen, I have some good news to share with you—I've secured a long-term partnership with that handicraft store in the community! We celebrated at home today. By the way, I've completed the registration for the training program you mentioned earlier, and I've received the confirmation.
Sister: That's fantastic! Congratulations! I knew you could do it. It's great that the training is confirmed. Let me know if you need any help with anything.
Mom, Xuanxuan rode his bike to school by himself. I'll be back after dropping off Zhezhe and Xinxin.
Sister Xiuqin, I have prepared the tea and snacks for this afternoon. You can come directly to the lounge area of the community activity center to find me.
Aunt Wu, Xiuyin and I have sorted out the goods for tomorrow's market. They are mainly zodiac sachets and handkerchiefs. How is your preparation going?
Mom, I'm home and the pork rib soup is already simmering. I'll go pick up Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin in a little while, so don't worry.
Alright, be careful on the road. Don't make the soup too salty; the kids don't like it.
Zhiqiang, dinner is almost ready. I've made stewed pork rib soup with Chinese yam. About what time can you get home?

Xiulan, I've just finished my shift and will arrive in about half an hour. By the way, I bought some plastic film and bamboo strips for setting up small arched greenhouses. Let's work on the vegetable garden together tonight.
Sister Xiuqin, I received the 600 yuan for that handmade order yesterday! The customer was very satisfied and specifically wrapped it in red paper. I'm truly delighted.
Sister, regarding Mingxuan's high school entrance exam, Zhiqiang and I discussed it last night. We're thinking of signing him up for a weekend tutoring class. What do you think?
【XX Bank】Dear customer, a deposit of 600.00 yuan was made to your savings card ending in 8899 at 19:45. The current balance is 15,236.78 yuan. For details, please call 955XX.
Xiulan, I saw from your social media that the vegetable garden you set up today looks great! I'll also be at the weekend market. How about we set up our booths next to each other?
Honey, your lunch box is on the kitchen counter. Remember to take it with you. It's raining today, and the roads are slippery, so please drive slowly.
Received, and I've taken the bento. It's raining quite heavily, so please be careful on your way to the market after dropping off the children.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan had a slight cough last night. I have brought his water bottle and medicine to school today. Could you please remind him to drink more warm water? Thank you very much!

Good morning, Mom! It's raining today, so please remember to take an umbrella when you and Dad go out to buy groceries, and be careful not to slip. Everything is fine on my end. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe have both finished their breakfast.
Sister Xiuqin, you go ahead and have lunch first. I'll watch the stall. Please bring me a jianbing guozi, without chili.
Alright, I'll go now. The lady earlier mentioned she would come back this afternoon to take another look at that peony painting, so please keep an eye out for her.

Sister Xiuqin, today's market proceeds have been tallied, totaling 1,280 yuan. According to the 50/50 split, your share of 640 yuan has been transferred to you via WeChat. Please check and confirm. The remaining items have been packed and taken home by me. Thank you for your hard work!
Mom, I tried practicing Baduanjin this morning and felt much more physically relaxed. Is your back still hurting recently? Remember to apply the medicated plaster on time.
Xuanxuan, take your younger brother and sister to brush their teeth and wash their faces. Remember, Zhe Zhe, brush for a full three minutes. Xin Xin, I will help you with your braids later.
Mom, the kids have been well-behaved today, and the house is all tidied up. You and Dad should rest early. It's going to get colder tomorrow, so please keep warm.

【Xishunjia Yuan Community Service Station】Dear resident, the promotional brochure regarding the flexible employment subsidy policy you inquired about is now ready and can be collected at the service station at any time. If you have any questions, please call 022-6868XXXX.
Zhang Shufen: Xiulan, I forgot to mention earlier that a new batch of Northeast rice has arrived. It makes particularly fragrant porridge. If you want some, I can save a bag for you.
Li Xiuying: Have you had lunch, dear? Don't just make do when you're alone—fry yourself some eggs. The weather is still chilly, so don't skimp on food.

Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to let you know that after school this afternoon, Mingxuan will play basketball with his classmates for a while before coming home. He is expected to arrive home around 5:30 p.m. Thank you.

Mom, I made vegetable and egg noodles for lunch, using the leftover porridge from this morning as the soup base, and it turned out quite flavorful. Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin were both very well-behaved when they went to school this morning. What did you and Dad have for lunch?

Sister Xiuqin, I used the overcast stitch you taught me last time when sewing buttons onto Lao Ma's coat, and it worked really well—the buttons are much more secure now. Have you been working on any new handcraft projects lately?
Shufen, it's starting to rain outside. It seems our evening walk will have to be canceled. Let's reschedule for another day.

Mom, it's raining today so I'm staying home. The water ripple pattern in my embroidery piece "Four Seasons of Spring on the Calm Sea" is a bit challenging, but I'm starting to get the hang of it. How have you been feeling lately?
Mom, I made millet porridge this morning and warmed up some steamed buns and leftovers. The kids have all eaten, and Zhiqiang has already gone to work. Have you and Dad had breakfast yet?

The aphid control methods covered in today's training were very practical, and I took notes. On the way back, I bought pork ribs and Chinese yam at the Taian Shengshijun Market to make soup tonight. Has your training session finished?
Aunt Wu, good evening! I've sent the link and password for tonight's seminar in the group chat. Have you received them? I will join ten minutes early to test the equipment.
Xiulan, I've received it and have already entered the meeting room. You must give us a good presentation of that 'Spring' sample today!
Mom, have you had breakfast yet? I just dropped the kids off at school and bought some pork ribs to make soup for dinner.
Ms. Wu, the peony-patterned coasters you ordered have been embroidered. I've checked them and they're all fine. Would it be okay if I deliver them to you tomorrow morning?
Good morning, Mom! I just finished practicing Baduanjin, and I feel really great. Is your leg still hurting lately? Remember to take your medicine on time and wear more clothes.

Mingxuan, Mom has finished dropping off your younger brother and sister, and now I'm going to buy groceries. Have a good lunch at school, and come straight home after school in the afternoon—don't play outside.

Hello Auntie Sun, this is Ma Xiulan. I will come to your stall around 9 o'clock this morning to buy pork ribs and fresh shrimp. Could you please set aside two jin of good-quality spare ribs and one jin of live shrimp for me? Thank you!
Good morning, Sister Wu. I have sorted out all the embroidered handkerchiefs and coasters from the last batch and will deliver them to the shop around 9:30. Would that be convenient for you?

Hello Ms. Li, the birthday gift sachet you requested can be expedited. The design will follow the previous peony pattern, and it will be ready for pickup next Monday morning. Is that acceptable to you?
Ms. Zhou, I started working on that rush order of the small sachet with the peony pattern this evening. It will be delivered on Monday morning.
Me: Zhiqiang, remember to come back for lunch. I've bought sea bass and pork ribs.
Me: Sis, my back has been a bit uncomfortable lately. How effective was that medicated plaster you mentioned last time?

Aunt Sun: Xiulan, happy Women's Day! The sea bass is fresh today, I saved a big one for you.
Me: Zhe Zhe, we're having pork rib noodle soup for lunch. Come out and eat.

Sister Wang, the Suzhou embroidery piece "Flowers Blooming in Wealth and Honor" you ordered has been completed. I've taken photos for you to see the result. The delivery is scheduled for tomorrow at 3:00 PM at our usual place, Ciyuanzhai. Would that be convenient for you?
Alright, Sister Ma, I've seen the photos. The embroidery is truly exquisite! I'll be there on time tomorrow at 3 p.m. at the Porcelain Affinity Studio.
Mom, I steamed some buns this morning and will bring them over for you to try at noon. I also picked some vegetables from the yard.
Sister Xiuqin, I'm going to the fabric market later. Do you still need that turquoise silk thread you mentioned last time? If so, I can take a look for you.
Aunt Wu, I saw a batch of cotton-linen base cloth at the market. The texture is good and the price is reasonable. Would you like to come and take a look?
Elder sister, I'm taking the kids to our parents' place for lunch. Are you free to come over this afternoon? Mom says she misses you.
Mom, we're almost there, about ten minutes away. The buns are still warm!
Dad, I've printed a copy of Mingxuan's sports training plan and brought it over. Could you please take a look at it for him?

Mom, we've arrived home. We had a wonderful conversation this afternoon. Please take care of yourselves, and dress warmly as the weather is getting cold. Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, and Xinxin all said they miss their grandparents and look forward to visiting again next time.
Xiulan: Sis, I took the kids back to our parents' place today. They're both doing well and even talked about you. How have you been lately?

Sister Xiuqin, I saw the embroidery pattern you posted in the group today—it looks really beautiful, and I saved it! Are there any new odd jobs available at the shop recently? I just finished a batch of work.

Sister Xiuqin, I've sorted all the embroidery threads by color after my noon break and took a photo for you to see. What do you think of this color scheme? How should we divide the work for the next step?
Mom, I've picked up the kids and arrived home, and I'm about to start cooking. Mingxuan is also back and is doing his homework. What did you and Dad have for dinner tonight?

Xiufen, I've just finished organizing the craft corner and will start embroidering the new order this afternoon. The new phone is really convenient to use, and the video call quality was excellent just now. I'll teach you more functions when we meet this weekend!
Sister Xiulan, the lotus pattern you shared is really beautiful! The petals are embroidered with such fine detail. Is the new phone working well for you? Congratulations on starting work!
Mom, the kids are all asleep. Today was the first day of our family agreement, and it went fairly smoothly. How are you and Dad feeling today?
Aunt Sun, the training session just ended. I'll come over in a bit to buy some pork ribs and vegetables. Could you please set aside two jin of spare ribs for me? Thank you!
Sis, my morning training session has ended, and I even received some lettuce seeds! Have you taken your lunch break yet? If it's convenient, would you like to have a video chat?
Alright, I'll turn on the video now. It's a good opportunity to show you the notes I've taken and what the seeds look like.
Mom, I just finished a video call with my elder sister. The weather is quite nice over there, and my little nephew is sleeping soundly. Are you and Dad both feeling well today?
Zhiqiang, I've hung up the clothes, the electric bike is fully charged, and the raincoat and umbrella are in the bike basket. Is everything going smoothly with your work shift?
Mingzhe, Mom has already picked up your sister and is now heading to your school. We should arrive in about five minutes. Wait for me inside the school gate and don’t wander off.

Sisters, today's training at the agricultural technology station was incredibly rewarding! The instructor shared many practical planting techniques and even gave us some lettuce seeds, saying it's the perfect season to plant them. I took some photos and will share them in the group chat for everyone to see!

Mom, I spent 35.8 yuan on groceries today, and the pork ribs were quite fresh. Tomorrow morning, I plan to fry an egg for Mingxuan and warm up a glass of milk. He has a test tomorrow, so he needs to eat well. What did you and Dad have for dinner tonight?

Sister Wang, last time you mentioned wanting to plant some lettuce in your small vegetable garden. I happened to receive some seeds during a training session today, and they are of good quality. Tomorrow afternoon, after the rain stops, I plan to loosen the soil and sow the seeds. Would you like to join me? I can also share some of the seeds with you.

Fen'er, I received the new phone, and it works really well! I just had a video chat with my eldest sister, and it was incredibly clear—it warmed my heart. If you're free this weekend, come over for a meal. I'll make your favorite braised pork ribs.

Sister Xiuqin, I'll continue embroidering that lotus coaster this afternoon. The lotus leaf part is almost done, but I haven't decided on the color scheme for the goldfish pattern yet. By the way, where did you buy that gradient thread you mentioned last time?
Honey, dinner is almost ready. We're having braised pork ribs and scrambled eggs with tomatoes. About what time will you be home? The kids are waiting.
Mom, there was a little incident at home today. Mingzhe got a bit upset wanting to play Mingxuan's game console, but we talked it through later. How have you and Dad been doing lately?

Chunmei, I finished embroidering the lotus leaf on the lotus coaster today, and I feel my skills have improved. What have you been busy with lately? Are you free to come over to my place this weekend?
Mom, I just finished grocery shopping and am on my way to see you. I brought you some fresh vegetables.

Hello, the five pairs of lotus coasters you customized have all been completed. I have taken photos for you to review. If everything looks good, would it be possible for us to deliver them tomorrow afternoon?
Mom, I made pork and chive buns that you love for dinner, and also cooked millet porridge. Dinner will be ready at six o'clock, waiting for you and Dad to come over and eat together.
Honey, the steamed buns are almost ready. About what time will you be home? Mingxuan said there was a basketball game at school today and wants to tell you about it when you get back.

Sister, the family rules have been well implemented this week. Zhe Zhe has made significant progress in controlling his volume, and the whole family has praised him. As a reward, we'll go for an outing this weekend, and the children are really looking forward to it.
Chunmei, let's meet tomorrow at 3 p.m. at Bama Tea's Jinghai Second Branch. I'll share the good news about completing the embroidery with you in person. Don't be late!

I'm about to head out and should arrive at your place in about 25 minutes. I've brought you a small bookmark and some snacks. Looking forward to the afternoon tea gathering!

Dad, Mom, tomorrow morning at 9 o'clock, our whole family is going to Xishuangtang Ecological Park for a spring outing. We'll bring sandwiches and fruit. Would you like to join us? We can drive to pick you up.
I: Mingxuan, the steamed buns are heated, and the apples and cucumbers are sliced and packed in the box. Remember to come out and have some after you finish reviewing. Don't overwork yourself.

Me: Sis, our family is having a picnic next to the peach blossom grove. Xuanxuan is finally able to relax, and Zhe and Xin are having a great time playing. Let me show you the peach blossoms we photographed—aren't they beautiful?

Mom, we went on a spring outing to Xishuangtang today and had a wonderful time. The kids all ate peach blossom cotton candy. I just got home and am preparing dinner—I'm going to pan-fry the leftover buns and make some soup. How were you and Dad today?
Xinxin was exceptionally well-behaved in kindergarten today, carrying her own little backpack as she walked in. The teacher also complimented her on how pretty her dress looked.

Mom, I took Xinxin to kindergarten today. Seeing her skipping into the school reminded me of Xuanxuan and Zhezhe when they were little. How is your leg pain lately? Please remember to apply the medicated patches on time.
Auntie Sun, this is Xiao Ma who just bought the pork and ribs from you. The ribs you gave me today look really fresh, thank you! I'll definitely come back to buy from you next time.

Sis, look, the lettuce in my little garden has sprouted! [Image] I had a bowl of tomato and egg noodles for lunch, taking advantage of the freshness—it was so satisfying. The sachet I’m embroidering for you also made progress today.

Mom, Zhe Zhe has a slight fever today and just took some medicine before going to bed. Please take care of your health, both you and Dad, as there’s been a lot of flu going around lately.

Sister Xiuqin, I finished outlining the draft for the Qingming embroidery piece last night. I'll be going to Ciyuan Zhai this afternoon to deliver the coasters, and I can bring the embroidery sample for you to take a look at.

Mom, Zhe Zhe is feeling much better today and had a good appetite this morning. Do you and Dad have any plans for today?

Chunmei, I'll send you the illustrated guide for the Baduanjin movements via WeChat later, as mentioned on the phone just now. Please practice according to the guide, and feel free to ask me if anything is unclear.

Good morning, Mom. I woke up early today and practiced some Baduanjin exercises, and I feel quite good. Did you and Dad sleep well last night? The weather is nice today, so you can go out and get some sun.
Sister Wang, there will be a community cleanup tomorrow morning. I have prepared brooms, dustpans, buckets, and rags, and they are placed behind the door. Do you have enough tools on your side?
Mom, I made braised pork ribs and winter melon soup for dinner. What did you and Dad have tonight? Our whole family will come over for dinner tomorrow afternoon. Do you need me to bring any dishes?

Okay, Xiulan, I'm coming downstairs now. See you at the entrance.

Mom, I'm going to Shufen's house for dinner tonight. I made the cold mixed shredded vegetables and braised hairtail that you love. Would you like me to bring some over for you?

Mom, Dad, we just finished breakfast. Zhiqiang and the kids are all at home today, so it's quite lively here. Have you had your breakfast yet? The weather has been damp these past couple of days—are your backs and legs holding up okay?
Sister Wang, I'm taking Xinxin to play in the children's area. The weather is nice today. Would you like to come over to my place for a visit this afternoon? I'll brew some jasmine tea.
