Welcome Sister Xiulan to join [Skilled Sisters Club]! Let's exchange craftsmanship and share joy together from now on!
Xiulan, a notification for next week's handicraft activity has just been posted in the group chat. It will be held at the community activity center on Wednesday at 2 p.m. Are you available to attend?

I: I really enjoyed our conversation during the walk just now; it felt like we were back in the early days of our marriage. Also, don’t worry too much about our eldest son—we’ll work through it together.
The children are all asleep, and the house is quiet and peaceful. Xuanxuan was really well-behaved today, which warmed my heart. You should rest early too, as you have work tomorrow.
Xiulan: Sister Xiuqin, I was watching the seed stitch tutorial this morning and kept having trouble with the winding step. When are you free to come to my place and give me some guidance?
Zhou Xiuqin: Xiulan, no problem. I'll be free after 3 p.m. I'll bring some new patterns to show you then.

Mom, I'm heading out now to pick up Xinxin and Zhezhe. I should arrive at the kindergarten around 4:30. After picking up Zhezhe, we'll go straight home.

Sister Wang, I just finished my morning exercise, and today I feel all my joints and muscles have loosened up. Regarding the rapeseeds you asked about yesterday, I'll find them after I finish my work in the vegetable garden this afternoon and bring them over to you tonight.

Xiulan, no rush, please attend to your matters first. Regarding the "Shaking the Head and Wagging the Tail" movement in the Eight-Section Brocade today, I always feel like I can't quite engage my waist properly. When you have some free time, could you give me some guidance again?
Honey, the kids are up and breakfast is ready. Drive safely on your way to work, and remember to have lunch on time.
Mom, I'm up. The weather is nice today. Did you and Dad sleep well last night?

Sister Zheng, I'm currently reviewing the notes from the last community training session—they were explained in such detail. You mentioned last time that you wanted to grow some scallions. My notes include information on how to raise seedlings. Would you like me to take a photo and send it to you?

Dad, Mom, I planted all the seeds in the small vegetable garden this morning and feel a great sense of accomplishment. How have you been lately? The weather has been changing a lot, so remember to add or remove clothes as needed.
Mom, I'm doing well, and the children are all behaving. When you and Dad have time, come take a look at my little vegetable garden. Once the vegetables are grown, I'll bring some back for you.

Mom, Xinxin and I had spinach tofu soup and shredded potatoes for lunch, and she really enjoyed it. What did you and Dad have for lunch? The rain has stopped today, so please don't go out this afternoon—the ground is slippery.

Me: I've finished checking all the children's homework today. Xuanxuan was very self-disciplined, and Zhe Zhe has understood the math problems. I just finished washing up and am planning to look at my phone for a while before going to bed. You should also rest early.
Honey, I've packed your lunch box and left it on the dining table. Drive safely today, and we'll be waiting for you to come home for dinner tonight.

Sister Wang, the weather is lovely today. After practicing the Eight-Section Brocade, I feel refreshed and invigorated! I thought about that new embroidery pattern you mentioned yesterday and will bring it for you to see later.
Xiulan, yes, today's practice was especially comfortable! I'm looking forward to seeing the embroidery pattern you mentioned. I also have a new idea—shall we discuss it when we meet this afternoon?

Good morning, elder sister! I just read an article about health preservation in spring, and it was quite informative. How have you been feeling recently? The weather has turned warmer here in Tianjin.
Xiulan, I'm doing quite well, just a bit busy. Your brother-in-law is away on a business trip. I'll take a look at the article as well. Please take good care of yourself and don't overwork.

Xinxin's Mom, Yuxin had a bit of a runny nose at kindergarten today. We gave her an extra blanket during nap time. Please remember to dress her warmly when you pick her up.

Xiufen, I've paid the electricity bill myself using WeChat! I followed the official account of State Grid Tianjin Electric Power, bound my account number, and it succeeded right away. It feels quite simple!

Mom, Dad, I have some good news to share. I paid the electricity bill myself using my phone today! From now on, I can teach you how to pay utility bills like water and electricity, so you won’t have to go to the service center anymore.
Xinxin, did you enjoy the steamed sea bass Mom made today? Seeing you eat so heartily at lunch made me really happy.
Zhe Zhe, Mom will be at the school gate soon. Please pack your things and wait for me at the classroom door. After I pick you up, we'll go together to pick up your sister.
Honey, the wonton and soup are ready. About what time will you be home? We'll wait for you to start dinner.

Sister Wang, I'm about to head out. Let's meet at the usual spot in the square. The weather is nice today, perfect for practicing Baduanjin.
Auntie Sun, I'll arrive at the market around 9:40 today. Could you please reserve one jin of fresh pork ribs and half a jin of live shrimp for me? Thank you!
Aunt Sun has saved the ribs and shrimp for you. Just come and pick them up. The spinach is also very tender today. Would you like to take some?

Sister Wang, have you remembered all the steps for paying the electricity bill I just taught you? From now on, you can pay it at home, which is much more convenient. Feel free to ask me if you have any questions.
Auntie Sun, will you be open this afternoon? I'd like to buy some soy sauce and cooking wine, and I'll also take a bag of peanuts while I'm at it.
Honey, it seems Xuanxuan has been under a lot of academic pressure lately. He often has trouble sleeping at night, and I'm a bit worried.
Well, you're right, we shouldn't put too much pressure on him. By the way, you mentioned earlier that the team might have secured a stable partnership? What exactly is the situation?

Elder sister, I ran into Xiaohong at the agricultural supply store today and we chatted for quite a while. How have you been feeling lately? Now that the weather is getting warmer, feel free to come visit when you have time.
Auntie Wu, the video tutorial this morning was incredibly helpful! I crocheted another coaster using the corner technique you taught, and this time it turned out especially smooth. Thank you so much!
Mom, I made braised pork ribs for lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Li Xiuying: We made dumplings for lunch. Your father said he wants to visit the kids this weekend. Which day next week would be convenient?
Sister Wang, I'm going to turn over the soil in the vegetable garden this afternoon. You mentioned last time that you wanted to plant some scallions. Shall I reserve a small plot of land for you?

Master Liu, while tilling the soil in my vegetable garden, I unearthed several rather large stones. Would you be available to come by and take a look when it's convenient for you? Could you help clear them away?
Mom, I've cooked millet congee and prepared a cold dish for dinner. Would you and Dad like to come over and join me?
Sister Xiuqin, I practiced the new knitting technique you taught this afternoon and felt I was getting the hang of it more and more. The lace I crocheted turned out especially beautiful. Thank you!
Mom, I've picked up Xinxin and am about to head home to cook. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Mom: We had noodles for our meal, simple and convenient. Your dad is in good spirits today. Make sure you and Xinxin have a proper meal, don't just focus on being busy.
Mingxuan, have you finished your homework? I noticed the light in your room is still on. Go to bed early, as you have school tomorrow.

Mom, I was organizing the wardrobe this morning and noticed that Xuanxuan's sports pants are now way too short, and several of Zhezhe's sweatshirts and T-shirts have also become too small. We need to buy new ones for them. I'll go check out the market this weekend.
Zhiqiang, the cuff of your work vest is worn out. I've taken note of it and will check if there's a suitable replacement for you over the weekend.

Mom, I felt significant improvement in my morning exercise today. I can lift my arms higher now, and my breathing is smoother. I plan to go to the wholesale market this weekend to buy spring clothes for the kids. How have you and Dad been doing lately?
Sister Wang, I went to the vegetable garden this afternoon and replanted the lettuce and leaf lettuce, and also put up labels. See you at the morning exercise tomorrow!

Sister Zheng, all 20 bibs have been embroidered with the rabbit pattern, and they have been checked with no issues. What time would be convenient for you tomorrow morning? I can deliver them to you then.
Xiulan, thank you for your hard work! Let's meet at the entrance of the community activity center at the usual place tomorrow morning at 8:30. I'll have the payment ready in cash for you.
Sister Wang, are you free to come to my house this afternoon? I bought some new yarn and would like to study that new pattern with you. I also have some insect repellent to give you.

Mom, breakfast is almost ready. The millet porridge is nearly done, and the steamed buns and bean paste buns are heated up. Have you all gotten up over there? We'll come pick you up as soon as we finish eating and get ready, so we can set off together.

Zhiqiang, come down to the vegetable garden quickly and take a look! The lettuce and leaf lettuce we planted have sprouted little buds, dotted here and there—it's a delightful sight!
Mom, our little vegetable garden has sprouted! Both the lettuce and the leaf lettuce have come up, with their green little shoots—it's such a joy to see!
Mom, we're all packed and ready. We'll pick you up at your place around 9:20, then head to Dengfa Taobao City together to buy clothes for the kids.

Mom, Mingxuan's study state is fairly good today. It's just that I keep worrying about the high school entrance exam. Are you and Dad both doing well?
Mom, breakfast is ready. There's congee, steamed buns, and eggs. Are you and Dad up yet?
Mingxuan, Zhe Zhe, Xinxin, hurry up and get out of bed for breakfast. I bought you new clothes today. After eating, see if you like them.

Sister Wang, I'm heading out to the commercial street to buy some clothes and should be back around noon. You mentioned yesterday that you wanted to buy a cardigan—would you like me to take a look for you?
Good morning, Xiulan! The weather is nice today. How is your Baduanjin practice going? I've been thinking of learning it recently. Do you have any tips to share?
Zhiqiang, I bought new clothes for the children and you. Zhezhe will definitely like that blue sweatshirt. The total cost was 780, which is within the budget.
Mom, I'm taking Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin to the park for a walk this afternoon, and we'll be back before dinner. How are you feeling today? Is your back still hurting?

Mom, are you feeling better after the moxibustion treatment? Is your leg still hurting badly? Please lie down and rest properly at home, and avoid walking around. I'll have Zhiqiang bring you dinner tonight.

Sister Xiuqin, the pillowcase dimensions and fabric colors will follow what we agreed on via WeChat. I sketched a few draft designs for the mandarin duck pattern this evening and will take photos to show you tomorrow in better daylight. Please review them and give your feedback.

Sister Wang, it was such a pleasure running into you during my walk by the river just now! After chatting with you, I feel much more at ease. Let's plan another walk together when the weather is nice next time.
Alright, Xiulan, I also find chatting with you particularly pleasant. You look great, and your children are so well-behaved. I really admire that! Let's meet up again next time.
Xuanxuan, it's great to see that you've prepared your school uniform! Remember to wear your red scarf tomorrow. Get some rest early and have a good night.
Okay, Mom, the red scarf is in the schoolbag. You should also rest early. Happy Mother's Day! Good night.
Master Liu, this is Ma Xiulan. I will be at my parents' home at 45 Shengli Street around 8:10 this morning to replace the window screens. Please make sure to arrive on time. Thank you.
Auntie Sun, I will come to your stall to buy winter melon and pork ribs after 1 p.m. Please save some good ones for me. Thank you!
Sister Zheng, I will be at the community activity room at 2:30 p.m. to help organize the craft materials. Do you need me to bring some glue or scissors?

Mom, I'll pick up Xuanxuan and Zhe Zhe from school at 4 p.m. this afternoon and then head straight home. For dinner, I plan to make stewed pork rib soup. Would you and Dad like to come over and join us for dinner tonight?
Mom, I made millet porridge and fried eggs with ham this morning. If you and Dad haven't had breakfast yet, please come over and join us. The kids are all up as well.
Xiulan: Alright, we've just finished our morning exercise and will be right over. Your dad mentioned he's been missing Xuanxuan and Zhezhe.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingzhe has a bit of a cough today. Could you please remind him to drink more warm water during the break? Thank you!
Sister Xiuqin, the outline and ears of the little rabbit have been embroidered. What do you think of the gradient color transition effect? [Image]
Mom, we're having steamed perch, spinach with minced garlic, and pork rib soup with winter melon for dinner tonight. Would you and Dad like to come over and join us?

Zhezhe, Mom is cooking. You and your sister should focus on your homework in the living room. If there are any questions you don't understand, mark them first. Dad will explain them to you when he comes back, or I will help you after I finish my work.
Sister, we practiced portion control for dinner today. I ate slowly and only had half a bowl of rice, and my stomach feels very comfortable. How has your blood sugar control been recently?
Dear, breakfast is in the pot—millet porridge and fried eggs. Xuanxuan rode his bike to school by himself. I'll be back after dropping off Zhe and Xinxin.
Mom, I've picked up the blood pressure medication and Dad's medicated patches. I'll bring them over after lunch. Did you check your blood pressure today? How are you feeling?

Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I'd like to confirm with you whether the math tutoring class this afternoon will proceed as scheduled. Mingxuan mentioned that he is a bit uncertain about it.

Good morning, Sister Wang! I just came back from a walk and noticed that the community bulletin board has posted the new enrollment policy. When you registered your grandson last year, besides the household register and property ownership certificate, did you also need to prepare the original copies of the child's birth certificate and vaccination record? I'd like to ask for your advice based on your experience.

Sister, I went to the community hospital today to get medicine for our parents and took the opportunity to check out the primary school enrollment policy. I took a photo of it. Zhe Zhe will start school next year. How was the registration process for your little one last year? Was it smooth? Is there anything in particular we should pay attention to?

【Jinghai Community】Dear homeowners, a 'Policy Interpretation Session on Transition from Kindergarten to Primary School' will be held at the community activity center at 9:00 AM this Friday (May 16). We have specially invited teachers from the District Education Bureau to answer questions on-site. All parents are welcome to attend. Reply TD to unsubscribe.

Sister Xiuqin, I've almost finished embroidering that 'little rabbit' pattern you mentioned wanting to see last time. The eyes and tail are all done, and it looks especially adorable. If you have time this afternoon, would you like to come over and take a look? We can also discuss the color scheme for the next 'sunflower' piece.
Honey, are you coming home for dinner tonight? I'm planning to make noodles with gravy. Also, if you pass by the vegetable market on your way home from work, could you buy two cucumbers?

Honey, I'm making dinner now—braised chicken wings, broccoli, and tomato egg soup. You'll probably be home around six, right? Zhe Zhe hasn't finished his homework yet, so I'm keeping an eye on him while I stir-fry.
Mom, please make Zhe Zhe's favorite braised chicken wings for dinner tonight. He's a bit upset because he didn't meet the running standard in his PE class today. Have you and Dad had dinner yet?

Mom, I just got back from the market and bought some tofu skin and scallions. I plan to make scallion egg noodle soup for lunch. What will you and Dad have for lunch? Remember to take your blood pressure medication on time.

【Jinghai Community】Dear residents, there will be a free health lecture at the community activity center this Saturday at 9:00 AM. The topic is "Prevention of Common Summer Illnesses." You are welcome to attend. Reply TD to unsubscribe.
Xiulan, last time you mentioned wanting to learn that new embroidery technique. I found a video tutorial and sent it to your WeChat. Take a look when you have time.

Sister Xiuqin, I have finished embroidering the first petal of the sunflower pattern for the kindergarten order. I used No. 3 golden yellow and No. 5 orange for the thread colors. Could you please check if the color effect is acceptable? I will take a photo and send it to you on WeChat.

Shufen, I really enjoyed our chat during the walk just now. I'll check out that new stall at the market you recommended tomorrow. By the way, what's the name of the learning app your son uses? I'd like to give it a try for Mingzhe as well.

Dear Teacher Han, I hope I'm not disturbing you. This is Ma Xiulan, Ma Mingxuan's mother. I would like to inquire about the specific supporting documents required for the "consistency between household registration and residence" mentioned in the school admission policy. In addition to the household register and property ownership certificate, is a residence certificate from the neighborhood committee also needed? Thank you very much!
Mom, how is Dad feeling today? I finished cleaning the house this morning and will have a simple lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?

Sister Xiuqin, I just reconsidered the color scheme for 'Sunflower' and think using two shades of yellow paired with dark green leaves would make it more vibrant. What do you think? Let's meet to discuss in detail when you have time.
Honey, I've prepared stir-fried spinach with eggs, shredded potatoes in vinegar sauce, and winter melon tofu soup for dinner. About what time will you be home?
Mom, we just finished breakfast, and the kids ate heartily. Have you and Dad eaten yet?
Good morning, big sister! We just finished breakfast, and the kids are being quite lively. How are things on your end?
Mom, I made millet porridge and scrambled eggs this morning. If you and Dad haven't had breakfast yet, come over and join us. The kids are all here.
Zhiqiang, I'm planning to make noodles with gravy. It seems we're running low on garlic at home. If it's convenient for you on your way back, could you bring a couple of heads of garlic?
Okay, I'm almost home. I'll pick up a bottle of vinegar on the way.
Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I would like to schedule a time to discuss my child's recent academic performance. Would tomorrow afternoon be convenient for you?

Chunmei, the weather has been lovely lately. When would you like to meet up for a walk in the park? I've been sticking to my morning exercise routine recently, and it feels wonderful. I'd love to share that with you.

【Jinghai Community Health Service Center】Dear Parent, Our system indicates that your child Ma Yuxin's DPT vaccine booster shot is approaching its due date. Please bring the vaccination certificate for the catch-up vaccination in the near future. Appointment phone number: 022-6869XXXX.
Aunt Sun, this is Xiao Ma. I'm going to the market later and would like to buy some old pumpkin and spinach. Could you please save some fresh ones for me? I want to try steaming pumpkin.

Sister Wang, regarding our earlier conversation about Zhe Zhe's school, I just recalled that their homeroom teacher, Teacher Yang, mentioned there will be a parent open day next week. Does your child's school have similar activities?
Zhiqiang, I've just recorded today's grocery expenses in the ledger. We need to budget our food expenses carefully this month. Let's discuss it tonight.
Mingzhe, have you finished your math homework? Dinner is almost ready here. Bring it over for me to check when you're done.

Sister, I tried making a healthy dinner with less oil and salt today, and the kids' response was okay. Regarding the recipe you mentioned last time for enhancing flavor with mushrooms, how exactly is it done?
Aunt Sun, the sea bass you bought today is very fresh, thank you! Also, I wanted to ask if there will be fresh broccoli available tomorrow? I'd like to buy some more.

【Jinghai District Chaoyang Street Community Hospital】Dear Parent, Your appointment for supplementary vaccination for your child (Ma Yuxin) has been successfully scheduled. The time is this Friday (May 23) from 9:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Please bring the vaccination certificate and arrive on time. Inquiry Phone: 022-6869XXXX.
contactName: Jinghai District Chaoyang Street Community Hospital

message_content: Sister Zheng, regarding the handcraft order you referred to me, I made good progress today on the feather part of the crane pattern and expect to complete it on schedule. Thank you for introducing such a great job!

Sister, I went to the vegetable garden this afternoon and checked. The bean seeds haven't sprouted yet, and the soil was a bit dry, so I just watered it. How are the cucumber seedlings you planted doing over there?
Sister Wang, I'll come to your place around 7:40 p.m. and meet you downstairs. I've brought some bean seeds for you, and we can also have a chat.
Sisters, the steamed sea bass and garlic broccoli I made at noon today are both healthy and delicious. I've shared the recipes in the group chat—give them a try!

Auntie Sun, the sea bass and winter melon look very fresh today. I'd like to buy one sea bass, one piece of winter melon, two blocks of tofu, and a bunch of baby bok choy. Please set them aside for me. I should arrive at the market around 8:30.
Mom, I made tomato and egg noodles for lunch. What did you and Dad have? The weather is muggy, so please take care to avoid heatstroke.

【Jinghai Skilled Sisters Group】Sisters, please submit your embroidery works at the community activity room tomorrow at 2 p.m. Remember to bring the packaged finished products, as Sister Zheng will be there to collect them.
Master Liu, the ceiling light in my living room has been flickering lately. Would you be available to come take a look in the next couple of days?

Sister, I finally finished inspecting and packaging all the embroidery pieces today, and they will be delivered tomorrow. I also heard from Sister Xiuqin that there might be a new order opportunity, which makes me both happy and a little nervous. The children are all asleep, and I’m getting ready to rest as well.
Mom, it's raining today. The children all have their umbrellas. Please take care not to catch a cold at home, both you and Dad.
Me: Honey, the deposit for the kindergarten order came in today. I'll show you the transfer record during dinner tonight, and let's celebrate properly!

Mom, I landed a big order today for Dragon Boat Festival sachets for a kindergarten. I told Zhiqiang about it tonight, and he was really happy. I'll come visit you once I finish up with this busy period.
Me: Xuanxuan, after your shower, remember to pack the textbooks and homework you'll need for tomorrow. Don't leave them at home like last time.

Zhou Xiuqin: Xiulan, I just posted a detailed tutorial for making Dragon Boat Festival sachets in the "Jinghai Skilled Sisters" group. I have mugwort and fabric here. If you need them, come and get them this weekend.

Me: Sister Xiuqin, I've received the tutorial—it's so detailed! I've been wanting to learn this. I'll use the fabric I have at home for now, and I'll come pick up the mugwort from you this weekend. Thank you, sis!
Zhiqiang, my back is a bit sore. Could you please fill a hot water bottle for me when we watch TV later? Thank you.
Have you seen the sketches of the sachets I drew this morning? Which design do you think looks the best? I'd like to hear your opinion.
Xiulan, focus on embroidering the little bear this afternoon, but don't overwork yourself. Remember to take regular breaks and move around.
Sister Xiuqin, I plan to finish embroidering the rabbit this afternoon and then make a mugwort sachet. I'll try making the zongzi-shaped one you mentioned last time.
Mom, I'm almost done with school. About what time will you arrive at the school gate?
Xuanxuan, Mom just picked up Xinxin and Zhe Zhe. We'll be at your school gate in about ten minutes. Please wait a moment.
Sister Wang, I made a mugwort sachet this afternoon to help calm the nerves. I'll bring it over to you in a little while.
Xiulan, thank you so much! Your hands are truly skillful. I’ve actually been having trouble sleeping lately.
Zhiqiang, the orders are progressing quite smoothly today. The bear embroidery patches are completed, and the children are all doing well. How are things on your end?
Mom, our class won the basketball game at school today, and I scored two goals.
【Jinghai Handicraft Association】Dear members, please note that the submission deadline for the Dragon Boat Festival themed handicraft works is June 10th.
Xinxin, have you arrived at the kindergarten? Did the teacher praise your little rabbit embroidery patch today? Mommy misses you.
Aunt Sun, are the tomatoes and cucumbers fresh today? I'll come by around nine o'clock. Please keep two jin of minced meat for me. Thank you!
Sister Xiuqin, when I embroider the neck of the deer, the transition of fur colors always feels a bit stiff. Could you give me some guidance when you have time? I can take a photo to show you.
Sister Xiuqin, I was just making a mugwort sachet, but the closure never seems to be very neat. I was wondering if you have any good methods?
Mom, I made meatball soup for dinner today, and the kids all said it was delicious. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
Me: Xinxin, Mom is on my way to pick you up now. I'll arrive in about 15 minutes. Please wait for me at the kindergarten entrance.

Me: Sister Xiuqin, I visited the art museum today and saw many beautiful New Year paintings. I took some photos and will share them in the group for everyone to see, especially the one titled 'Abundance Year After Year.' I want to try embroidering it.

Sister Zheng, I have started embroidering the sixth 'Little Fish' pattern for the kindergarten order. The combination of blue and silver-gray silk threads works very well, and the outline is basically completed. It is expected to be fully finished this afternoon. Can we deliver it together tomorrow?
Great job, Xiulan! You embroidered so quickly. I happen to be going to the community tomorrow afternoon at two o'clock, so I'll swing by your place to pick it up. Thanks for your hard work!

Sister Xiuqin, I've almost finished outlining the 'kitten' I've been embroidering this afternoon. The orange silk thread looks particularly good against the white background. I've saved the diagram of the plum blossom stitch you mentioned last time and will try using it on a sachet later.

Aunt Sun, are the green beans fresh today? I'm planning to make stir-fried green beans with pork later and will come to buy some around five o'clock. Could you please set aside half a kilogram for me?

Sister Wang, I just picked up my child and am now picking beans in the hallway. Regarding the pickled cucumbers you mentioned yesterday, I happen to have some extra cucumbers at home. Would you like me to bring some over tomorrow?
Mom, I've bought the mugwort and calamus and hung them on the door. Breakfast will be ready soon—millet porridge and fried eggs. You can eat as soon as you get up and finish washing up.

Sister Xiuqin, good afternoon. I'm at home today making five-color ropes for the children for the Dragon Boat Festival, and I remembered the braiding method you taught me last time—it works really well. Are you making them again this year?

I'm in the process of weaving, and I've added some new patterns this year. You're skilled with your hands, so yours are bound to look beautiful. By the way, regarding the new pattern we discussed last time, shall I take a picture and send it to you?
Sister Wang, I'm at home this afternoon making zongzi for dinner. Have you finished wrapping your zongzi? This year, I made two kinds of fillings: candied dates and sweet red bean paste.
Fen'er, you looked so radiant on the phone! The zongzi are ready. Come over for dinner tonight. Your brother-in-law has prepared his specialty dish, so you can taste our cooking skills.

Mom, we're having a family dinner tonight, and Yuxin has some amazing news to share! It's about her performance at kindergarten, and the whole family is really excited. I'll send you the video after dinner.

Elder sister, wishing you good health and peace on the Dragon Boat Festival! It's quite lively at home today—Yuxin has been chosen as the little lead for the kindergarten performance! The whole family is thrilled for her; this child is really promising.

Xiulan, I heard from your mother that Yuxin has landed a leading role? Congratulations! Our Xixin is truly amazing! Be sure to let us know when the performance is scheduled—we'll definitely come to cheer her on!
Honey, you've worked hard today. The stove you built is great, and the zongzi you cooked smells wonderful. Would you like zongzi or porridge for breakfast tomorrow? I can make porridge for you.

Chunmei, are you asleep? Today's Dragon Boat Festival was particularly fulfilling. I was busy from morning till night, but seeing the children so happy made all the tiredness worthwhile. You should also rest early.
Xinxin, have you put on the butterfly wings and hair clip? Don't be nervous. Mom believes you are the best little butterfly!
Good morning, Mom! I just finished my workout. The weather is nice today, so you and Dad should also get some exercise when you go out.
Hello Teacher Li, this is Ma Yuxin's mother. We have already taken our seats in the auditorium. Approximately what time will the performance officially begin?
Honey, the performance was absolutely fantastic! Xinxin did exceptionally well, she wasn't nervous at all. I recorded a lot of videos, I'll send them to you later!
Sister, Xinxin's performance was a great success! We just finished and are on our way home. She is absolutely thrilled.

Sister Xiuqin, I tried sketching the embroidery pattern "Abundance Year after Year" at home this afternoon, and found it quite interesting. However, the fish scales didn't turn out as smoothly as I'd hoped. When do you have some free time to help me take a look?
Xinxin's performance today was particularly successful. Photos and videos have been posted in the group chat, and everyone is praising her!
【XX Bank】Dear customer, your savings card ending with 8899 was used for a transaction of RMB 128.00 on June 01, 2025 at 22:15. The current balance is RMB 15,328.76.
Fen'er, are you asleep yet? Xinxin's performance today was absolutely wonderful. As her mother, my heart is filled with immense joy, and I wanted to share this happiness with you.
Sister Wang, I've made some zongzi and will bring them over to you around 3:30. Will you be at home?
Dad, Mom, good morning! The weather is nice today. I met Sister Wang while taking a walk this morning. You should also remember to stay active and move around more.
Sister Wang, I'll be coming over around 2:30 later to give you a sachet and have a little chat while I'm there.
Mom, I just went to Sister Wang's place for a while. She gave me some sweet garlic, and I'll bring some back tonight. How is your wrist feeling today?
Me: Zhiqiang, I'm planning to make seaweed and pork rib soup and stir-fry some water spinach for dinner. About what time can you get home?
Honey, I've safely dropped all three kids off at school. Breakfast is keeping warm in the pot, don't forget to eat.

Sister Zheng, I have checked and packed all the embroidery pieces for this afternoon, with all ten pieces accounted for. Shall we still meet at the entrance of the community activity center this afternoon?
Honey, I made your favorite sweet and sour pork tenderloin for dinner. Come home soon—I have some good news to share with you!
Mom, the kids have finished all their homework today, and I'm watching TV with them now. Everything is fine at home. You and Dad should rest early too.

Sister Xiuqin, I just saw that new cross-stitch pattern called 'Flowers Blooming in Wealth' in the group chat. It's really beautiful! Are you planning to stitch it? I'm quite tempted and would like to buy the thread together with you.

Xiulan, a friend of mine in the city saw the embroidered character "Fu" in your social media post and really liked it. She wants to commission a custom piece as a birthday gift. Would you be interested in taking on the project? Should I share her contact information with you?
Sister Xiuqin, thank you so much! I'm very interested. Could you please share her business card with me? I'll contact her right away.
Zhe Zhe, Xin Xin, it's time to go brush your teeth and wash your face to get ready for bed. Stop watching cartoons now.
Sister Wang, I just saw you on the balcony. Has the issue with the screen window you mentioned yesterday been resolved? If not, I can ask Zhiqiang to come over and take a look for you.
Xinxin, Mom has prepared the sewing kit and mint. We'll start making the sachet as soon as you wake up from your nap, okay?

Chunmei, last time you mentioned wanting to buy a mosquito-repellent sachet. I happened to be making some with my daughter today, using fresh mint, which should be quite effective. I made one for you as well and will bring it over another day.
Xinxin, would you like to go water the vegetables and pick some in the community garden with Mom? Get ready, and we'll set off right away.
Mom, I'll give you a call later. I received a new order today and took Xinxin to the vegetable garden. I'd like to chat with you about it.
Xiulan: Mom, it was great chatting with you on the phone. Please take good care of yourselves, you and Dad. Now that the weather is getting hot, don't hesitate to turn on the air conditioner.
Mom, the weather is nice today. I got up early and cooked some millet porridge. Did you and Dad have breakfast this morning? Remember to take your blood pressure medication on time.
Master Liu, are you available this afternoon? The light in the living room has a poor contact issue, and I'd like to ask you to come take a look.
For lunch, I made noodles with gravy, and Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, and Xinxin all ate quite a lot. Have you had lunch yet?
Sister Xiuqin, I've been thinking about the 'Fu' character embroidery pattern you mentioned last time, and I've come up with some new ideas over lunch. I'll bring it to show you later.
Mingxuan, have you finished your homework and preview? Don't forget to pack the textbooks needed for next week in advance.
Mingzhe, have you finished checking your homework? If there's anything you don't understand, you can ask your brother or ask the teacher tomorrow.
【Jinghai Skilled Sisters】Sisters, I brewed some mint tea today. It's refreshing and helps relieve summer heat. The recipe is very simple. Feel free to ask me if you need it.
Mom, breakfast is ready. There's millet porridge and steamed buns. Come and eat while it's hot.
Honey, you can leave first after finishing your meal. Be careful on the way, and come back early tonight. Tomorrow is Zhe Zhe's birthday.
Dear Teacher Han, Mingxuan has a slight cough today. Please kindly keep an eye on him. Thank you.
Xiulan, the weather is nice today. I saw you during my morning exercise. Has your wrist been feeling better lately?
Chunmei, I bought groceries this morning and have already marinated all the meat for Zhe Zhe's birthday tomorrow. Could you send me the sweet and sour sauce recipe you mentioned last time again?
Sister Xiuqin, I applied a warm compress to my wrist at noon, and it feels much better now. Could you please send me the link for the wrist brace you mentioned last time? I’d like to buy one.
Mom, I felt particularly good during my morning exercise today, and my body feels much more relaxed. Is your leg still hurting recently? Remember to apply the medicated plaster on time.
Mom, I sent you a voice message during my lunch break. How have your legs been feeling lately? It's getting hot, so please make sure both you and your husband take precautions against the heat.

Sister Wang, I'll be picking up the kids later. Today is Zhe Zhe's birthday, so it'll be lively at home tonight. You mentioned last time that you wanted to learn how to make sweet and sour pork tenderloin. I'll teach you once I'm done with this busy period.
Zhe Zhe, happy birthday! Mom wishes you happiness every day and progress in your studies! There's a surprise waiting for you tonight, so come home early after school.
Mom, I made millet porridge this morning, fried some eggs, and heated up some steamed bun slices. Would you and Dad like to come over for breakfast?
Sister, Xuanxuan and the others just finished breakfast and have gone to school. It's a bit cloudy today, so remember to bring an umbrella when you head out to work.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan was a bit slow this morning and left home a few minutes later than usual. He might be slightly late, so I apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Sister Xiuqin, I have prepared some new gold-wrapped embroidery threads for this afternoon's handicraft corner activity, and the color combinations are quite beautiful. I'll show them to everyone later. I also found an illustration for the gradient stitching technique you asked about last time. Shall we study it together during the activity?

Sister Zheng, the afternoon handicraft corner activity is all prepared, and I have also contacted the several new neighbors. Thank you for introducing this opportunity. After the event, I will report back to you on everyone's discussion about online sales ideas.

Mom, I'll be hosting the handicraft corner activity in the community this afternoon, and it should end around 4:30. I'll pick up Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin after school, and I'll come home to make dinner. Would you and Dad like to come over for dinner tonight? I've stewed chicken.
Honey, we're having braised chicken and garlic broccoli for dinner. Could you pick up some steamed buns on your way home from work? We've run out at home.
Fen'er, shall we have the family gathering at noon this Sunday? I plan to make braised hairtail and braised pork with potatoes. Do you and the kids have any special dishes you'd like to eat?

Sis, that's great! Let's set it for noon. The kids said they want to eat the cola chicken wings you make. By the way, my wrist was a bit sore after the handicraft corner activity yesterday. Since you do a lot of needlework, do you have any good ways to relieve it?
Sis, I just watched Xinxin's performance video and suddenly missed you so much. How have you been lately? Is it hot in Beijing?
I: Several cherry tomatoes have grown on the balcony, and the cucumbers have started to bloom. Xinxin and Zhe Zhe often mention their aunt, saying they miss you.
Li Xiuyun: Saw it! Xinxin is amazing! Everything is fine on my end, just busy. Are you free this weekend? Let's have a video call. I'd love to see the kids and your little vegetable garden.
Mom, tomorrow is the weekend. What would you and Dad like to eat? I'm thinking of making dumplings or stewing some pork ribs.
Xuanxuan, come home early after school today. Don't play outside for too long. I'll make your favorite braised chicken wings for dinner tonight.
Xiulan, how has your wrist been recovering lately? I've recently learned a set of massage techniques that are beneficial for joints. I can teach them to you when we meet this weekend.
Xiulan, regarding the cross-stitch thread you asked about last time, my shop has just received a new batch of colors. Would you like to come and take a look this weekend if you're free?
Mom, have you picked up Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin? I've finished delivering the goods here and should be home around six.
Mom, I'm making braised noodles with green beans tonight. Zhe Zhe is a bit slow with his homework, but Xin Xin is doing well with her pinyin. What did you and Dad have for dinner?

Hello Master Liu, this is Ma Xiulan from Jinghai Zhongnan Junyuefu. The screen window in my kitchen is broken, and I would like to ask if you could come over tomorrow to help repair it. What time would be convenient for you?
Ms. Ma, I'll be available after 9 a.m. tomorrow. Would around 9:30 work for you? I'll come directly to your place.
Alright, Master Liu, then it's settled for 9:30 tomorrow morning. Thank you for your trouble.

Mom, we'll have a simple lunch today. I've steamed some buns, stir-fried tomatoes and eggs, and made soup. In the afternoon, I'll stay home and play building blocks with the kids. Xuanxuan is reviewing his lessons, while Xinxin is building a castle.
Honey, we're having noodles with gravy for dinner. I'll prepare the gravy, and could you help roll out the dough for the noodles when you get home from work?

Mom, the kids have all washed up and gone to bed. I just finished soaking my feet, and my wrist is feeling much better. There's a financial planning lecture in the community tomorrow, and I plan to attend. You should also get some rest early.

Mom, I got up early today. I'll come over to see you and Dad after finishing some chores at home, probably arriving around 10 o'clock. Is there any dish you'd like to eat or anything you need me to bring from here?
Mom, we'll be there soon, arriving in about 10 minutes. I'm looking forward to having your noodles with gravy for lunch. I've brought some vegetables and snacks.
Fen, we're heading to our parents' house. About what time will you arrive? Let's have lunch together.

Sister Wang, our whole family had lunch together at my parents' house today. I've brought the embroidery patterns you mentioned wanting to borrow last time. Would it be convenient for me to drop them off at your place this afternoon?
Mom, we're home and have already watered the vegetable garden. We had a great time today. Please make sure you and Dad get some rest.
Fen'er, have you arrived home? You must be tired after today, especially carrying so many things. Did you have a smooth journey?

Dear Teacher Yang, I am Ma Mingzhe's mother. I will pick up Zhe Zhe this afternoon and would like to take the opportunity to learn about his recent performance at school. I plan to arrive at the school gate around 16:20. Would that be convenient for you?
Xinxin, Mommy will be at the kindergarten gate soon. Did you have a happy day at kindergarten today? When you see Mommy later, remember to say goodbye to your teacher.

Sister, Mingxuan is under a lot of pressure preparing for the high school entrance exams this week. His father and I have agreed that the whole family will do everything we can to support him. You mentioned a calming and brain-nourishing soup recipe last time—how exactly do you prepare it? I’d like to make some for him tomorrow.

Dear Teacher Yang, this is Ma Mingzhe's mother. For today's craft assignment, the child needs to make a small paper house. I would like to inquire if there are specific requirements regarding the dimensions and theme, so that we can prepare the materials accordingly.

Hello, Ma Mingzhe's Mom, the theme is "My Home". It is recommended to create it on A4 card paper, with the length, width, and height not exceeding 20 cm. Children are encouraged to do it themselves, with assistance from parents.
Honey, the 'Quiet Plan' went pretty smoothly at home today. The kids were much quieter in the evening. Could you turn down the TV volume a bit tonight? Let's just chat.

Zhiqiang, after the children go to bed tonight, let's have a proper talk about financial planning. I took some notes during a lecture this afternoon regarding fixed deposits and family emergency fund planning, and I'd like to hear your thoughts.

Mom, Mingzhe is feeling a bit under the weather today, but he's feeling much better after drinking some ginger-infused cola. The kids are all asleep. You and Dad should get some rest early too.

Don't worry, children will grow up eventually. Prepare a few extra sets of clothes, pack common medicines with clear instructions, and bring some of his favorite snacks. As for daily routines, just remind him a few more times.
Mingzhe, I've finished checking your homework. I've written the solution approach for that math word problem on the scratch paper. Please review it again, and let me know if you have any questions.

contactName: Jingwen Road Neighborhood Mutual Assistance Group

message_content: Sister Wang, have you signed up for the handicraft activity this Friday? You mentioned wanting to learn blanket stitch embroidery last time, and it happens to be covered in this session.

Sister Xiuqin, for the Friday handicraft corner activity, I plan to teach basic stitching techniques. I would like to ask for your advice: which color of embroidery thread provides the clearest demonstration effect when paired with light-colored embroidery fabric?

Dark red or sapphire blue thread shows up most clearly on light-colored fabric, with stitches appearing distinct. I still have some extra embroidery hoops here. Do you need me to bring them over on Friday?
That's wonderful, thank you, Sister Xiuqin! I have enough embroidery hoops here, so please keep yours as a backup. I've sketched several design diagrams and will ask for your feedback later.
Sister Wang, the brisk walk during our morning exercise today was quite pleasant. Shall we continue tomorrow at six o'clock in the usual spot?
Honey, I've organized the travel guide and brochures for our Beijing trip, with key attractions highlighted. Please take a look when you get back tonight.
Aunt Sun, I'm going to the market this afternoon and would like to buy some cotton fabric and embroidery thread. Do you have suitable materials available? Around what time would be convenient?

Sister Zheng, thank you for thinking of me. I have a lot going on at home recently, and I also need to take my child to Beijing over the weekend. I really can't fit this embroidery work into my schedule at the moment. Let's collaborate again next time there's an opportunity.

Honey, I'm organizing the driving test questions, and there are a few traffic signs I don't understand. One is a blue background with a white arrow in a circle, and the other is a red circle with a black "40" inside. What do these two mean?

A blue background with a white arrow in a circle indicates a straight-ahead lane, where only going straight is permitted and turning is not allowed. A red circle with a black "40" signifies a maximum speed limit of 40 kilometers per hour, which must not be exceeded.
Sister, we are going to Beijing for a trip this weekend. Which brand of children's cold medicine did you recommend last time? I am preparing to pack my luggage.
Sister Wang, I really enjoyed doing morning exercises with you today. We can often arrange to work out together in the future and have a chat as well.
Zhezhe, Xinxin, Mom has brought you to school. Listen to your teachers, pay attention in class, and I will pick you up this afternoon.

Xuanxuan, Mom is currently checking the items you need to bring for boarding school. The bed sheets and duvet covers have been embroidered with your name, and the toiletry bag and small medical kit are also prepared. Is there anything special you would like to bring?

Sister Xiuqin, I've prepared all the materials for tomorrow's handicraft corner. There is enough embroidery fabric and thread. I've sketched a few designs of the character "Fu" and auspicious clouds, which I think are quite suitable for beginners. How are your preparations going?

Auntie Wu, the handicrafts corner activity will be held at the Chaoyang Street Community Cultural Activity Center tomorrow, starting at 9 a.m. Please make sure you remember the correct location. I have come up with a few traditional patterns and would appreciate your guidance then.

Sister Zheng, thank you for introducing this handicraft corner activity. Tomorrow I plan to teach everyone how to embroider baby belly bands. I have brought all the materials. Would you like to come and take a look if you have time?

Hello Teacher Han, I am Ma Xiulan, Ma Mingxuan's mother. I would like to confirm with you that I have prepared the list of change of clothes and bedding for Mingxuan's boarding this week. Are there any other specific points I should pay special attention to?

Dear Parent of Ma Xiulan,  
We have received the checklist, and it is well-prepared. Additionally, please be reminded that there will be a mathematics unit test next week. You may want to remind Mingxuan to review during the weekend.
Honey, dinner is almost ready. We're having stir-fried bok choy, home-style tofu, and millet porridge. Can you make it home by 6:30? Zhe Zhe has almost finished his homework.

Sister Xiuqin, the tracing paper and fine-tip markers you recommended last time are really useful. I plan to trace the draft of the "Fu" character and auspicious clouds tonight. What new patterns are you embroidering lately?
Xiulan, I've just returned home from my morning exercise. I'm feeling quite energetic today, and the thought of going out tomorrow makes me really happy. How is your packing going over there?

Me: Just got home and I'm boiling water now. Yeah, the thought of going out to play really energizes me! My luggage is basically ready, I'll give it a final check after this afternoon's activity. Can you make it to the handicraft corner this afternoon?

【Skilled Sisters】Dear sisters, the basic embroidery stitch tutorial will begin promptly at 1:30 PM in the community activity room. Please bring your reading glasses. I have spare sewing kits available here.

Mingxuan, I've noted down the items we discussed earlier for boarding school: a sturdy backpack, as well as science fiction and historical storybooks. We'll take you to buy them after returning from Beijing. Please let me know if there's anything else you'd like to add.

Mom, I'd like the backpack in black, as it's more stain-resistant. For books, I'd like to buy "The Three-Body Problem" and "The Ming Dynasty: Those Things," if that's okay. I don't need anything else for now. Thank you, Mom!
Mom, I reviewed Subject One at home this morning. Xuanxuan and Xinxin have both finished their breakfast. I told them to wait for me at home, so don't worry.
Zhe Zhe, Mom passed the subject one test! I scored 92! Please tell your sister, I'm heading home now.

Sister Wang, I passed my subject one exam! I just got home and am packing to visit my sister in Beijing. I brought some homemade pickled cucumbers and sweet garlic, and I'll bring some for you to try later.
Mom, we've arrived at my sister's house. The children have just finished washing up and are getting ready for bed. Everything is fine here. You and Dad should also rest early.

Sister Xiuqin, I've just finished the color scheme for the baby bellyband and took a few photos. Could you take a look and see how this color combination is? I feel that the red and gold pairing is quite festive.
Sister, we've arrived at Tiananmen Square. There are so many people here, and the rostrum is absolutely magnificent! The children are all extremely excited and have taken lots of photos.

Fen'er, you must be exhausted after playing all day. I've finished tidying up the kitchen and brewed a pot of jasmine tea for you. Come to the living room and sit for a while—let's have a good chat, just the two of us.

Sister Xiuqin, I have finished sewing the main part of the baby hat you requested tonight. I will complete the hemming and decorations tomorrow during the day. When would be a convenient time for me to deliver it to you?
Okay, Xiulan, no rush. Take your time. I'll be home on Wednesday afternoon, so you can come directly then. Thank you for your hard work!
Mom, we've arrived home and settled in, and we've already had dinner. The kids have all taken their baths and are getting ready for bed. You and Dad should also get some rest early.

Sis, I'm home now, the trip went smoothly. Thank you for taking care of me during my stay in Beijing—I really appreciate it. I left the toys for Xuanxuan and Zhezhe under the coffee table in the living room. I hope they have fun playing with them. The breakfast you made was especially delicious. Next time you come to Tianjin, I'll cook for you.

Sister Xiuqin, I've finished embroidering the baby hat with a red "Fu" character. What do you think? When would be a convenient time for you to come and pick it up? Alternatively, I can also deliver it to you.
Mom, I made winter melon and pork rib soup, stir-fried vegetables, and multigrain rice for dinner tonight—all light and healthy. What time will you be home? I’ll get everything ready for the meal.
Honey, dinner is almost ready. Remember to buy some steamed buns on your way home from work. The multigrain rice might not be enough.

Good morning, Sister Wang! It was a pleasure running into you during my morning exercise just now. Is the square dancing you mentioned held every evening at 7:30 in the central square of the residential community? I plan to join in the future—it’s a great way to exercise and chat with everyone.

Hello Sister Xiuqin. The baby bellyband and small hat you ordered are all ready. I have carefully inspected, ironed, and packed them. Please let me know when it is convenient for you, and I can deliver them to you or you can come pick them up?

I’ll pick some fresh ones in a couple of days, along with some pickles I made, and bring them over for you and Dad to try.
Mom, I'm currently cutting the mattress for Xuanxuan to use at the boarding school. You mentioned last time that there's still some extra cotton at home. Can I come over this weekend to get some?

Alright, I'm heading out now. It should take about 20 minutes.

Mingxuan, when you come back from school this evening, I'd like to talk with you about the boarding school arrangements. Let's have a good conversation.
Zhezhe, Mom is taking your younger sister to kindergarten. Please get your schoolbag and water bottle ready at home by yourself. Dad will take you to school.
Mom, I'm up and just finished my Baduanjin exercise. The weather is nice today, so you and Dad should remember to go out and get some activity too.

Sister Xiuqin, the customer has confirmed satisfaction with the handmade order (baby belly bands and small hats). I will pack and ship them this afternoon, and I will send you the tracking number once it is available.

Sister Wang, is the square dance still at the usual time and place tonight? I'll head over right after dinner.
Zhiqiang, breakfast is on the table—millet porridge and steamed buns. Since your back has been bothering you lately, I've peeled the eggs for you. Remember to eat them.
Mingxuan, come straight home after school today. Don't play outside for too long. I'll check your homework tonight.
Dear Teacher Yang, I am Ma Mingzhe's mother. Mingzhe has a slight cough today, so I would appreciate it if you could keep an eye on him. Thank you!
Mom, I woke up early today and just finished my morning exercise. Did you and Dad sleep well last night? It's been hot lately, so please take care to avoid heatstroke.

Mom, I'll come see you this weekend and bring the photos from my trip to Beijing. Let me know what you'd like to eat in advance so I can prepare it.

Mom, Xuanxuan and Zhezhe each had two bowls of millet porridge for breakfast today, saying that the porridge you made is especially fragrant. Xinxin also finished her eggs.
Good morning, Sister Wang! I saw you during my morning exercise just now, and you looked so energetic. Will the square dancing tonight still be at the usual time and place?

Mom, we celebrated Xinxin's birthday today and made cartoon red bean buns. She was especially happy. How have you and Dad been lately? The weather is hot, so please take care to avoid heatstroke.

Mom, I made millet porridge and steamed buns this morning, and also fried some sunny-side-up eggs. The kids really enjoyed their meal. Zhiqiang also congratulated me on passing my driving theory test. How have you been feeling lately?
Sis, I've got some good news to share—I passed the written test for my driver's license! Zhiqiang mentioned it during breakfast this morning, and the kids were really happy for me too.

Mom, I'll come over to see you and Dad this afternoon. I'll bring the photos and videos from our trip to Beijing last week to show you. I also want to learn a few light dishes from you, as Zhiqiang's recent physical exam showed he needs to watch out for fatty liver. Please teach me.

Zhiqiang, I plan to make steamed fish and yam with wood ear mushrooms tonight following the recipe Mom taught me. The fish has already been marinated. If it's convenient on your way home from work, could you bring back a bottle of cooking wine? We're almost out at home.

Mom, I received my first payment for hand embroidery today, 500 yuan! It feels incredibly rewarding. I discussed it with Zhiqiang this evening, and we plan to save it for the children's future use.

Zhiqiang, I've already withdrawn the 500 yuan wages received today to the family card, and the account book has been updated as well. Let's discuss tonight about setting aside this amount and future income as a separate education reserve fund for the children, what do you think?

Well, that's a good idea, and I fully support it. When we go to look at refrigerators this weekend, we can also stop by the bank to inquire about the best way to deposit the money. You've worked hard, so get some rest early.

Sister Xiuqin, I have already transferred the seal script characters and auspicious cloud patterns onto the fabric for the newly received "Longevity" order and secured it with an embroidery hoop. The colors of the silk threads have also been verified, and I plan to start embroidering this afternoon.
Mom, I had tomato and egg noodles for lunch. I feel like our family's meals have been lighter recently, and Zhiqiang has been sleeping better. How have your and Dad's appetites been lately?
[Community Notice] Dear Residents, a fire safety knowledge lecture will be held at the Community Activity Center at 9:00 AM this Friday (August 1st). You are welcome to attend.
Sister, I bought the health tea you recommended last time and tried it. I do feel like my sleep has improved a bit. How is your neck pain lately? Is it still bothering you?
Mom, the millet porridge is ready and the fried eggs are done. Are you and Dad up yet? Remember to wake Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin up for washing up. Breakfast is on the table.

Okay, thank you, Xiulan! They're homegrown, so please don't be polite. By the way, I forgot to mention earlier—I think I saw the cross-stitch thread you asked about last time at that shop on Culture Street.

Mom, I'll pick Dad up at home at 8:30 tomorrow morning. I've already made an appointment at the hospital with a specialist in the respiratory department. Please prepare Dad's medical insurance card, ID card, and the previous X-rays. We'll go directly to the hospital.

Xuanxuan, are you settling in well at school? Sending you a message during the lunch break—remember to eat on time and get along well with your classmates. Mom will call you again on Wednesday evening.

Zhezhe is particularly energetic today, wearing his school uniform neatly and even taking the initiative to greet the teacher with a "good morning." Have you received the photos? How is Dad doing today?
Sis, I just finished buying groceries. The tomatoes and cucumbers are quite fresh. I'll tidy up the house and head to the hospital to see Dad around nine o'clock. Are you busy today?

Zhe Zhe, I've finished checking your homework and corrected all the typos. Remember to dry your hair after taking a shower so you don't catch a cold.
Son, I forgot to mention on the phone, is your living allowance enough? If not, just tell me. Make sure you eat well at school.

Sister, are you asleep? Dad's test results came out today. The doctor said his condition is stable and advised him to continue staying in the hospital for observation. Are you free to come visit tomorrow?
Mom, I didn't sleep well last night, and I woke up this morning feeling a bit heavy-headed. Have you had breakfast yet? How is Dad feeling today?
Sister Zheng, I will be at home this morning. If it's convenient for you, you can come over to review the lotus embroidery pattern proposal. We can discuss the deposit matter in person.

Ms. Zheng, I have received the deposit. Thank you. I will work carefully on the lotus embroidery. The production time is approximately two weeks. If you are not in a hurry, I will take my time to ensure the quality.
Sister, how is Dad doing today? Did the doctor say anything new? I just finished tidying up here, and I've been thinking about him all along.

Honey, the weather forecast says it's going to get colder tomorrow. Does Xuanxuan have enough warm clothes at the boarding school? Should I take some time tomorrow to send a couple of pieces over to him?
Alright, I'll follow your advice. Please also be careful at work and don't overexert yourself. I'll take care of things at home, and I'll visit Dad more often. We'll get through this together.

Ms. Zheng, I have started preparing your lotus embroidery order. The silk threads and embroidery fabric have been matched according to the design drawing, and it is expected to be completed next week.
Honey, I'll clean up the kitchen, and you help Zhe Zhe with his homework. We have a clear division of labor. I've put Xin Xin's craft kit on the coffee table; you can play with her for a while later.

Sister, I'm learning how to make Zèng Bèng Carp today. The steps for handling the fish scales and preparing the sauce are a bit complicated. You mentioned last time that there's a detailed video tutorial—could you please share it with me?
Mom, I just dropped Zhe Zhe off at school. It's a bit chilly today, so please make sure you and Dad stay warm at home. How did Dad sleep last night?
Sister Wang, I was cleaning the house this morning and have washed the steamer you mentioned wanting to borrow last time. Will you be free to come and pick it up this afternoon?

Hello Dr. Wang, I am Ma Jianguo's daughter. I have just organized my father's blood pressure data from the past few days. When would be a convenient time for you? I can take a photo and send it to you for review.

Sister Xiuqin, I'm currently working on that lotus embroidery order, but I'm having trouble with the gradient transitions. I took a photo—could you take a look and tell me if I'm splitting the threads correctly?

I've been feeling chest tightness and shortness of breath lately, and I get tired very easily. I'm not sure if it's due to lack of rest. Where exactly is that traditional Chinese medicine clinic you mentioned last time? I'd like to go and have a look.
Mom, how is Dad feeling today? Is his blood oxygen level still stable? Is there any new update from the hospital?

Dear Ms. Lin, I have noted down the size and color scheme requirements for your customized magnolia and magpie table runner. I will provide you with a preliminary design proposal and quotation regarding the budget and timeline this afternoon. Would that be acceptable to you?

Auntie Sun, is the carp fresh today? I'll be coming around 10:30 and would like to buy a carp weighing about two jin, along with a piece of tofu and some bok choy. Could you please set them aside for me?

Dear Ms. Lin,  
The embroidery design proposal, material list, and quotation for the magnolia and magpie pattern have been prepared and sent to your email. Please check your inbox. We look forward to your feedback.

Ms. Lin: Mr. Ma, I have reviewed the design drawings and quotation, and I am very satisfied! The deposit has been transferred, so let's proceed with this plan. We will finalize the silk thread colors next week.

Since you mentioned wanting to learn it last time, I'm sending you the key points first for your reference.

【Tongrentang Traditional Chinese Medicine Clinic】Dear Ms. Ma, your traditional Chinese medicine for today has been decocted and delivered. Please take it warm half an hour before bedtime, and avoid consuming raw, cold, or greasy foods. Wishing you a speedy recovery.

Xuanxuan, seeing you looking well in the video puts my mind at ease. Are you taking your medicine on time, and did you bring enough autumn clothes? If you get tired of the cafeteria food over the weekend, Mom can transfer you some money to buy some fruit and milk.

【Jingwen Road Community】Hello neighbors! With the Mid-Autumn Festival approaching, the community will hold the "Full Moon, Warm Neighborhood" event at the activity center on September 10 at 3:00 PM. The event includes activities such as solving lantern riddles and making mooncakes by hand. All residents are warmly welcome to participate! For more details, please contact the community grid member Zheng Xiuying.
Sister Wang and Shufen, I've forwarded the community Mid-Autumn Festival activity notice to the group chat. It looks quite interesting. Shall we go together? It'll be more fun with more people.
Hello Teacher Han, Yuxin has a slight cough today. Please keep an eye on her, and if she feels unwell, feel free to contact me anytime. Thank you!
Mom, I felt a bit of chest tightness today. Please take good care of yourselves at home, both you and Dad. I'm doing fine here, so don't worry.

Teacher Yang, Mingzhe forgot to bring his colored pencils for art class today. Could you please let him know that he can share with his deskmate? I will bring them when I pick him up this afternoon. Thank you!

Dear Ms. Lin, the custom-made 'Magnolia and Magpie' table runner has been revised according to your requirements. The photos have been sent via WeChat for your review and confirmation. Thank you for your patience!
Mom, I'm having a bit of insomnia. I keep worrying about Dad's health and the household expenses, and the more I think about it, the harder it is to fall asleep. How are you and Dad feeling today?
Mom, I've picked up Xinxin. She did very well in kindergarten today. We're looking at snails in the garden and will be home in about ten minutes.
Honey, I'm home and starting to prepare dinner. I'll check Zhe Zhe's homework in a bit. About what time will you be back?

Chunmei, let's meet at the starting point of the fitness trail at the west gate of the residential area at 6:30 p.m. for a half-hour brisk walk. Same place as usual—no one leaves until everyone arrives!
Sister, I went for a brisk walk with Chunmei today for exercise, and we talked about Dad's follow-up examination tomorrow. I still feel a bit uncertain about it. How have you been lately?
Zhezhe, Mom has checked your homework, and you corrected all the math problems correctly. Well done! Remember to pack your schoolbag after dinner.

Zhiqiang, please be extra careful on your way to Jizhou to pick up the goods today. The weather is cold and gloomy, so make sure to keep warm. I will accompany Dad to the hospital for his follow-up checkup later. I have already taken care of the children at home.

Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin, breakfast is on the table, remember to eat. It’s getting colder today, so make sure to put on your coats before going out. After dropping you off, Mom will go pick up Grandpa and Grandma.
Mom, I've dropped off the kids and am on my way to pick you and Dad up. Please wait for me at home, and don't worry.

Sister Wang, my father was just admitted to the hospital, and I'm currently tied up here and unable to leave. Could you please help pick up my son Zhe Zhe from school this afternoon and take him back to your place for a while? I'll contact you as soon as I get things settled here. Thank you so much!
Mom, Dad is awake. I just gave him some water to drink and wiped his face and hands. Please take your time on your way home to get the things, no need to rush.
Chunmei, how is Zhe Zhe doing at your place? Thank you for taking care of him. My father's condition has stabilized a bit, and I will come pick him up later.

Hello Dr. Wang, I am Ma Jianguo's daughter. Today during rounds, the attending physician mentioned that the CT scan shows improvement in the lung inflammation. However, we would like to confirm the daily care for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease with you again, especially regarding the timing of oxygen therapy and medication. Could you please explain it to us in more detail when you have time?

Mom, I just went to the cafeteria and bought some steamed buns and porridge. Please eat them while they're still warm. You must go home and rest for a while this afternoon—I'll be here. You can come back to relieve me in the evening. Only by getting enough rest can you take better care of Dad.

Sister Wang, the soup has arrived, and it smells absolutely wonderful! My father is also in better spirits today. I truly can't thank you enough for always keeping us in your thoughts. Once my father is discharged from the hospital, we will be sure to properly express our gratitude to you.

Mom, Dad finished the pork rib soup and his spirits are fairly good. I just finished washing him up and changing his clothes. About what time will you arrive at the hospital? I'll wait for you to get here before I leave, as there are some care details I need to discuss with you in person.
Honey, I just left the hospital and am taking Bus 54 home. I should arrive around 10:30. Are the kids asleep? Did you have dinner tonight?
Everyone is asleep, tucked in nicely. I just had a quick bite to eat and will wait for you to come back. Be safe on the road and don't rush too much.

Mom, Dad was breathing a bit heavily this morning. I just finished feeding him some millet porridge. Dr. Li said during rounds that his infection markers haven't dropped yet, so he needs to continue with the IV drip. You should go rest in the lounge for a while; I'll keep an eye on him.

Honey, have you made all the arrangements for Xuanxuan and Zhezhe to go to school? I've asked Chunmei to pick up Xinxin in the afternoon. Please come directly to the hospital after work tonight. I need to discuss Dad's condition with you.

Sister, I just came back from the hospital to cook, and I feel really upset. Dad's illness is heartbreaking to see, and I've been having severe chest tightness myself these past few days. I'm really worried that I might collapse too.
【XX Bakery】Dear Member, the birthday cake you reserved has been collected by Mr. Ma Zhiqiang at 18:40. Wishing you a happy birthday!
Sister, I'll probably arrive at the hospital around 8:30. When will you be able to get there?

Zhiqiang, I just spoke with the doctor. Dad's rehabilitation plan mainly involves oxygen therapy twice a day, along with several medications that need to be taken on schedule. We'll discuss the details of arranging caregiving shifts when we get home tonight.
Mom, I just left the hospital. Dad seemed in fairly good spirits today, and I've noted down all the doctor's instructions. I'm heading to the market now to buy some groceries.
Zhe Zhe, Mom needs to discuss something with your dad tonight. Please help your sister with her homework after school, and I will come back to make dinner.

Elder Sister, Zhiqiang and I have discussed and drafted a preliminary care schedule. We would like to coordinate the timing with you and Fen'er as well. When would be convenient for us to talk over the phone or meet in person?

Mom, I just helped Xinxin water the flowers, and she told me so many things about kindergarten—it was absolutely adorable. You've been working hard taking care of Dad at the hospital, so please make sure to get some rest yourself.
Mom, the weather has turned cooler recently. How are you and Dad doing? Has Dad's cough improved? Everything is fine on my end, so don't worry.

Sister, how is Dad doing today? I just finished cooking here. I made braised eggplant for the kids tonight, and Zhe Zhe said it smelled especially delicious. You should also eat on time and don’t overwork yourself.

Sister Zheng, I'm sorry to say that my father hasn't been feeling well recently and needs someone to take care of him. I may not be able to attend the handicraft corner activities on time for a while. I'll come over once things are settled at home.

Mom, I just got home and finished tidying up. How was Dad's condition at the hospital this morning? Did you have lunch? Do I need to bring anything from home when I come over this afternoon?

Hello Teacher Han, I am Ma Xiulan, Ma Mingxuan's mother. I saw the notice in the parent group and would like to learn more about the school's recent arrangements for psychological counseling for third-year junior high school students, as well as Xuanxuan's recent performance at school. Thank you.

School counseling sessions are scheduled for every Wednesday afternoon after class. The detailed notice has been posted in the group file. Mom, Dad was in much better spirits this afternoon. I helped him take a walk, and we chatted for a while. He’s started his IV now and has fallen asleep. Please don’t worry too much. See you tonight.
Sister Wang, my father drank the soup you sent yesterday. Thank you so much! I've been taking care of him in the hospital these days. I'll thank you properly when he gets better.
Honey, I'm home and about to make tomato and egg noodles. Around what time do you think you'll be back?
Mom, I've almost finished packing up here. I should be back at the hospital around nine o'clock. You should get some rest first.

Mom, I'm already home. There was a bit of light rain on the way, so I rode slowly. Dad's noon medication is in the blue pillbox on the bedside table. He needs to take it once at 12 o'clock, and there's another dose at 3 p.m. I've cleaned the soup jar and left it by the door, so you can take it directly when you get back. Please take care of yourself too, and don't overwork.
Honey, the kids have all gone to school and finished their breakfast. Please drive carefully on your way out. I have a pretty bad cold and will be resting at home.
Mom, I just got back from the hospital. Dad was stable during the night, so please don’t worry too much. I’ve caught a bit of a cold and need to rest for a while. I’ll contact you again around noon.
Sister Xiuqin, I'm truly sorry. My father has been hospitalized, and my cold has worsened. I'm afraid the embroidery work for you will have to be delayed for a few more days. I sincerely apologize.
Mom, I'm about to leave home for the hospital and should arrive in about half an hour. Have you had lunch yet?
Honey, I won't be home for dinner tonight. Remember to treat yourself to something nice—don't just settle for whatever's convenient.
Zhe Zhe, Mom is especially tired today. Please focus on your homework and try to finish it before nine o'clock, okay?
Xuanxuan, I've signed your homework and left it on your desk. Finish up early and get some rest.

Mom, Dad slept a bit better last night and coughed less. Honey, the kids have all finished washing up and are ready for bed. Xinxin was especially well-behaved today. Is everything going smoothly with your work? We can discuss the details of Dad's discharge from the hospital tomorrow over the phone once you're done with your tasks.
Dad, I arrived at the hospital a little after 6 a.m. Mom said you slept fairly well last night and your temperature is normal. I brought you some warm breakfast and will be up in a moment.

Dad, seeing you in such high spirits at the family gathering today made all of us especially happy! You've just been discharged from the hospital, so you still need plenty of rest—listen to Mom and Fen'er. I'll call you again tomorrow.
Mom, we've arrived home safely. The trip went smoothly. Please remind Dad to take his medicine before going to bed tonight, and you should also rest early. Thank you for everything!
Xuanxuan, remember to dry your hair after showering so you don't catch a cold. Zhe Zhe and Xinxin's pajamas are on the bedside. Please help them get them.

Ms. Wang, it was such a pleasure running into you downstairs today. My father has been recovering quite well lately, and it's all thanks to the nutritional supplements you sent earlier—I truly appreciate it! Xuanxuan, after your bath, please put the clothes you changed out of into the laundry basket, and then you can read extracurricular books for half an hour. Mom, Dad's blood oxygen level was 96 this morning, which is a bit better than yesterday. He took all his medication on time. For breakfast, he had millet porridge and eggs, and his spirits are good. Please don't forget to take your blood pressure medication yourself.
Aunt Sun, are the spinach and tomatoes fresh at your stall today? I'll probably come by around nine o'clock to buy some, and I'd also like to get some pork ribs while I'm there.

Sister Zheng, I have finished embroidering the lotus table runner you ordered. I have checked it several times, and the stitching and color scheme are exactly as you requested. I am very satisfied with the result. If it's convenient for you this afternoon, may I deliver it to you?
