Sister Zheng, I will arrive at the building downstairs of your home around 1:30. The table runner has been packed in a dust-proof bag. Additionally, regarding the magpie-on-plum-blossom pattern you mentioned last time, I have found a few samples and will bring them for you to have a look later.

Sister Zheng, I have received the payment of 150 yuan. Thank you! I have noted down the size and requirements for the new order, and I will show you the first draft in a week. The symbolism of the magpie on the plum blossom is truly wonderful, and I will embroider it with great care.
Shufen, I'll come to your store to buy some yeast powder later, arriving around 16:20. Please save a pack for me.

Sister, I picked up Xinxin from school today. She was singing the new nursery rhyme she learned all the way home and was so happy. How have you been feeling lately? The weather is getting colder, so please take good care of yourself.
Chunmei, today I tried making Tianjin steamed buns for the first time. The dough turned out okay, but the pleats didn't look very neat. I'll have to ask you for some tips on the technique later.

Sister Xiuqin, the steamed buns I made are ready! The kids all said they taste delicious, though they don't look very presentable. The filling recipe you shared last time really works—the meat filling is especially fragrant.
Dad, Zhiqiang and I went over the household accounts today. Don't worry about the medical expenses—we have everything under control. Just focus on resting and recovering.
Fen'er, I talked with Zhiqiang about our household expenses this evening. There is indeed some pressure, but we can always find a way through it together. How have things been on your end lately?
Xuanxuan, I've checked all your homework, and you did a great job reciting the English text. Go wash up and get to bed early, as you need to wake up early tomorrow.
Mom, Dad seemed to be in fairly good spirits today and had a small bowl of porridge for dinner. I gave him a foot soak, and he has already gone to bed. You should also rest early.
Mom, I made pork rib soup this morning and will bring it over for you and Dad later. How is Dad feeling today?
Honey, the pork rib soup is packed. I'm about to head over to our parents' place. Have you had lunch yet?

Fen'er, I'll take care of the main dishes and buns for tomorrow's gathering. Could you bring the cold dishes and fruits? Mom will prepare the stir-fried dishes. Let's set the time at 11:30. Does that work for you?
Alright, sis. I'll bring a shredded vegetable salad and some watermelon. For taking care of Dad next week, I can go on Wednesday and Friday afternoons. You take Tuesday and Thursday, okay?

Sister Zheng, I won't be able to attend the handicraft corner activity this week as I need to take care of my elderly family member at home. I'll take this week's tasks home in advance and bring them with me next week.

Mom, we made mapo tofu and garlic stir-fried vegetables for dinner tonight. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe have both finished their homework, and Xinxin has been very well-behaved too. Have you had dinner yet?
I have prepared all the dishes for tomorrow's Mid-Autumn Festival, including fish, shrimp, meat, and vegetables. You can focus on work without worry and come back directly for dinner in the evening.
Mom, is the congee ready? Has Dad taken his blood pressure medication? I've heated up the steamed buns here, so we can get ready for breakfast.
Honey, where are you guys? Xuanxuan has already arrived. Mom, Dad, and I are waiting at home. Drive safely.

Sister, Fen'er, I have compiled the care plan for Dad that we discussed earlier and sent it to the family group chat. Please review it and let me know if there is anything to add. I will primarily be responsible for the daily care, Fen'er will take over on weekends, and Sister, you will come back once a month. The expenses will be handled as we agreed.

Sister Zheng, I've reviewed the 'Magpie on Plum Blossom' embroidery order you introduced, and the pattern is truly beautiful. I've already started matching the threads, and it will take about a week to complete. Is that acceptable to you?

Mom, the show has started. Please come to the living room with Dad. We've saved seats for both of you.
Coming, coming. Your father walks slowly, we're on our way.

Alright, sis, I'll be right there. I also brought some pomelo; let's cut it up and have some together.

Hello Dr. Wang, my father's blood pressure reading today is 138/85, with a heart rate of 72. His spirits are fairly good, but he still has a cough with some phlegm. Do you think his medication needs to be adjusted based on this situation?

Blood pressure is well controlled; continue to monitor it. If there is phlegm with the cough, you may continue taking the expectorant syrup I prescribed last time, and drink plenty of water. If it is convenient tomorrow afternoon, you can bring the elderly gentleman to the clinic for a lung auscultation.
Mom, I just finished washing the dishes. How was Dad feeling this morning? Is his condition still stable?
Mom, I'll ride the electric bike over later to bring Dad's new medicine and also visit you both. I should arrive around eight o'clock.

Sister Xiuqin, I have already finished embroidering two of the little rabbit embroidery pieces for Huakang Kindergarten this morning. I will work a bit faster this afternoon and should be able to complete all of them by tomorrow.

【Huakang No. 1 Kindergarten】 Dear Ms. Ma, please complete the embroidery handicraft order (rabbit pattern *10) you have undertaken and deliver it to the kindergarten office before October 3rd. Thank you for your cooperation.
Sis, happy National Day! Our whole family is watching the military parade live broadcast—it's absolutely spectacular! How are things on your and brother-in-law's end?
Mom, for dinner we had the leftovers from lunch. We reheated the sweet and sour pork and steamed buns, and cooked millet porridge. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
How is Dad's spirit today? I did some crafts with the kids this afternoon, and Xuanxuan cut a really nice five-pointed star.

Ma Jianguo: He's still quite energetic. He was talking about you all this afternoon. He's good with his hands, so let the kids do more hands-on activities. Your mom said you had leftovers for dinner. Don't always make do; pay attention to nutrition.
I'm going out for a walk and will be back in about half an hour. There are many colorful lights hanging along Jingwen Road, and they look quite beautiful.
Liu Chunmei: Xiulan, happy National Day! I saw the festive handmade decorations on your windows in the Moments! Are the children all home for the holiday?
Twenty years have passed. Thank you. The children are asleep, the balcony is quiet, and the moon is bright.
Happy National Day, big sister! We made some crafts at home today, and the kids were overjoyed. Dad is recovering well, so don’t worry. Take good care of yourself too.
Mom, I made millet porridge and steamed buns for Dad this morning, and also fried a sunny-side-up egg. Has Dad's blood pressure been measured? I'll come over to check on him later.
Mom, I've arrived. How was Dad feeling this morning? I brought a blood pressure monitor and will check it for him in a bit.

Xiulan, your father's blood pressure is 138/85, and his heart rate is 72, both of which are quite stable. I have scheduled a follow-up appointment at the community hospital for next Tuesday at 3:00 PM.
Honey, I made a vegetable and tofu stew and stir-fried tomatoes with eggs for lunch. We'll eat around 12 o'clock. You can come straight home after work.

Xiulan, last time you mentioned wanting to enroll Xuanxuan in a calligraphy class. I asked Teacher Wang at the Children's Palace, and he said there is a trial class this weekend. Shall I send you the contact information?

Ms. Zheng, I have finished embroidering all the cartoon animal parts for the kindergarten's batch of handmade embroidery, and I have checked them—everything is fine. When would be a convenient time for me to deliver them to you?
Mom, I've stewed winter melon and meatball soup for dinner and also stir-fried some bok choy. Would you and Dad like to come over and eat together?
Xuanxuan, have you finished your math homework? Zhezhe and Xinxin, please also complete your assignments promptly. I will check them once you're done.
Xinxin, it's time to go brush your teeth and wash your face. Zhezhe, you should hurry up too, don't dawdle.
Sister, are you asleep? I just finished taking care of the kids and saw the travel photos you posted on your Moments. They look really beautiful.
Mom, breakfast is ready. There's millet porridge, steamed buns, fried eggs, and pickles. You and Dad can come straight to the dining room to eat after you get up.
Good morning, Sister Xiuqin! It's raining today. Will the embroidery group activity still proceed as scheduled on your side?
Zhiqiang, Mingxuan said he wants to go to the library with his classmates this afternoon. Let's discuss the timing when you come back for lunch at noon.

Sister Xiuqin, the color transition of the peony petals I embroider always looks unnatural. What exactly is the technique of "long and short stitch overlapping embroidery" you mentioned? Could you explain it to me when you have time?
The long and short stitch involves first embroidering a long stitch, then connecting it with a short stitch nearby, with colors layered gradually. Take a photo and show me how you look now.
【China Mobile】Dear customer, your account balance is 58.23 yuan, with 2.1GB of data remaining. Click to check details.
Mingxuan, lunch is almost ready, and your father will be home soon. Get ready to eat.
Mom, I just finished organizing the seasonal clothes and put away all the summer ones. How is Dad feeling today? Is his leg still hurting badly?
Mom, I made millet porridge and fried eggs this morning, and the kids really enjoyed them. Did you and Dad have breakfast yet?
Sister, Happy Mid-Autumn Festival! I made a hearty breakfast for the kids this morning, and both Xuanxuan and Zhe Zhe have grown quite a bit. How are your holiday preparations going over there?

Aunt Sun, this is Xiao Ma who just bought pork from you. The pork belly today was really excellent, and I'm sure my mother-in-law will love it. We'll come by tomorrow at noon and would like to buy some pork ribs as well. Could you please save two jin of good ones for me?

Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. Sorry to disturb you during your holiday break. I'd like to confirm whether the return to school after the National Day holiday is on the 7th. I will double-check the homework list with Mingxuan again. Wishing you a happy Mid-Autumn Festival!

Zhiqiang, I've tidied up the kitchen and put all the dishes and utensils back in their places. If you don't have much work at the company this afternoon, try to come back early. I've picked out the children's clothes—take a look and see if the blue set is suitable for them to wear tomorrow.
Chunmei, what are you doing at home? I just finished tidying up the house, and my back is sore from exhaustion. What was the brand of that pain-relief patch for backaches you mentioned last time?

Mom, I just checked the fridge. There are leftover chicken pieces and vegetables from the day before yesterday. I'll heat them up for dinner, stir-fry some celery with dried tofu, and make a soup. I won't cook any new dishes to avoid waste. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
Mom, we'll arrive around 11:30 tomorrow noon. Please don't go to too much trouble for us, you and Dad. Just a simple meal will be fine. How was Dad feeling last night?
Xuanxuan, you just taught me how to use the map, and I tried searching for Tiananmen. The route was very clear—it's really convenient! Thank you, son!
Mom, I've packed everything. The fish and vegetables are all packed. I'm ready to leave now and should arrive around nine-thirty.
Honey, I'm almost home. I bought some beer and peanuts on the way to welcome you back.

【Huakang No. 1 Kindergarten】Dear parents, there will be a parent-child handicraft activity in the kindergarten activity room from 4:00 PM to 5:00 PM this afternoon. Please have at least one parent accompany your child to participate. Kindly reply with "Received" upon reading this message.
Received
Mom, I made millet porridge for dinner and stir-fried some broccoli. There are also leftovers from lunch. Would you like to come over and have dinner together?
We won't be going. Your father just finished his meal, so you can go ahead and eat by yourselves. He has a follow-up appointment at the hospital tomorrow. Will you be available?

Mom, we'll have a simple lunch today: stewed meat with cabbage and vermicelli, and sweet and sour cabbage, with rice as the staple. We'll gather at your place for dinner. Do you need any ingredients? We can bring them along when we come over.
Mom, we've set off and should arrive in about 25 minutes. Please don't start preparing anything yet—wait until we get there so we can all do it together.
Aunt Sun, I'll come by around 2:30 p.m. to buy some bok choy and tofu. Please save some fresh ones for me. I'd also like to chat with you about my dad's recent situation.
Mom, I'll call home around 3:30 to ask how Dad is feeling today and whether his breathing is still smooth.
Mom, I'm going to pick up Mingzhe and Yuxin from school. I've stewed pork belly with tofu for dinner. What time will you be home?
Received. I'm also about to get off work and will be home around six. Drive safely on your way.
Honey, Chunmei came over to visit today and we had a long chat. The kids are already asleep, and everything is fine at home. How is work going on your end?
Sister Xiulan, the 'Family Harmony Brings Prosperity' embroidery you shared in the group chat is truly beautiful! The color coordination is particularly elegant.
Sister Wang, it was such a pleasure running into you at the kindergarten gate this morning. Your little treasure looked so lively in that little yellow duck jacket today!
Mom, it's a bit chilly today. Please remember to put on an extra coat when you and Dad go out. I made millet porridge this morning. If you come over, it's still warm in the pot.
Xinxin, Mom has arrived at the kindergarten gate. Please pack your things and come out.
Honey, Xinxin and I had tomato sauce noodles for lunch. I left the sauce in the fridge for you. Just cook some noodles when you come back tonight.

Shufen, thank you for your concern. My father has been much better recently. I had him try the medicated plaster you recommended. By the way, I have taken photos of the embroidery pattern you mentioned wanting to see last time. I will send them to you later.
Mom, the weather is nice today. I'll take Dad for his follow-up appointment after dropping off the kids. Please rest at home and remember to take your medicine on time.
Dr. Wang, hello. I am Ma Jianguo's daughter. My father's follow-up examination results this morning were very good. Thank you for your affirmation and guidance.

Auntie Liu, I have sent you the photos of the custom embroidery piece "Family Harmony Brings Prosperity" via WeChat. Please take a look and see if you are satisfied. There is no rush for the final payment; you can transfer it to me whenever it is convenient for you.

Xiulan, I have received the photos of the embroidery. They are absolutely beautiful! Even better than I had imagined—your craftsmanship is truly excellent! I have transferred the remaining balance of 500 yuan to you via WeChat. Please check and confirm.
Honey, I've prepared the account book and your income details. After the kids are asleep tonight, let's sit down in the living room and go over this month's expenses to see where we can cut back.
Me: Mom, I made millet porridge and fried eggs this morning. Have you and Dad eaten yet? Xuanxuan and Zhezhe have both finished their homework. Xinxin said this morning that she wants to visit you.

Li Xiuying: We've all eaten, your father has gone out for a walk. It's fine as long as the children have finished their homework; let them play more on weekends. If Xinxin misses me, just bring her over. I've saved some apples for her.
Zhou Xiuqin: Xiulan, I'm almost at your building. I brought some crispy persimmons from our own tree for you to try.
Me: Alright, Sister Xiuqin, I'll come downstairs to meet you right away. The tea is already brewed, and it's the perfect time to learn the new stitching technique from you.
Me: Sister Xiuqin, I learned so many online shopping tips from you today, they're incredibly useful! Please take care on your way home. The persimmons are especially sweet, thank you so much!

【Physical Examination Center, Jinghai District People's Hospital】Dear Client, you have successfully scheduled a comprehensive physical examination (Basic Package) for Wednesday, October 15th, at 8:00 AM. Please bring your ID card and arrive on an empty stomach. Address: 3rd Floor, Outpatient Building, No. 18 Jiankang Road, Jinghai District. Inquiry Hotline: 022-68691234.
contactName: Physical Examination Center of Jinghai District People's Hospital

message_content: Sister Zhou, for the Double Ninth Festival community handicraft corner, I'm thinking of preparing paper-cut blessings and small knitted wool gourds. What do you think? We'll need materials like red paper, scissors, wool yarn, and crochet hooks.
Zhiqiang, I just calculated again. The utility bills for this month are 50 yuan more than last month. We need to be more frugal. Don't forget about going to the bank for consultation tomorrow.

[XX Bank] Dear customer, our bank has newly launched the "Salary Savings" time deposit product with an annual interest rate of 2.15% and a minimum deposit amount of 1,000 yuan. For details, please reply "1" or consult our branch.
Mom, Zhiqiang and I will have jianbing guozi at home tomorrow morning. What would you and Dad like for breakfast? I'll make extra and bring it over to you.
Mom, I just got back from the new market. The produce is fresh and cheap. I’ll make Dad some crucian carp soup for lunch and bring it over in the afternoon. What are you and Dad having for lunch?

Sister Zheng, I have drawn up and listed the paper-cutting and weaving materials needed for the Double Ninth Festival event. I will be visiting my parents' home in the afternoon and will send you the photos later to see if they are acceptable.
Honey, are Xuanxuan and Zhezhe taking their nap? I've finished the activity list here. Please keep an eye on them while they do their homework this afternoon.
Sister Zheng, I've sent you the photo of the list. The colors and quantities of the colored paper and yarn are clearly marked. Please check if any adjustments or additions are needed.

Sister Wang, for the Double Ninth Festival activity, I plan to teach everyone how to cut the character "Fu" and weave small gourds. You are quite skilled with your hands—would you be able to come and help me teach together at that time?

Auntie Wu, we need some weaving demonstrations for the community Double Ninth Festival event. As an experienced hand, could you lend us a few of your woven gourds as samples? I'll come by to pick them up tomorrow.
Honey, Dad has taken his medicine as prescribed and is doing well. I'll stay and chat with our parents a bit longer, and we'll probably head back around four.
Zhiqiang, I've just readjusted the family budget and added a dedicated emergency education fund, which allows us to save 800 yuan per month. Please check if there's anything you'd like to add.
Mom, I just finished shopping at the supermarket. I bought toothpaste, dishwashing liquid, and the cookies the kids love. I'm walking home now. What did you and Dad have for lunch?

Sister Xiuqin, the petals of my newly embroidered 'Wealth and Honor Peony' are done with the layered needle technique, and the color transitions look much more natural now! Where did you buy that gradient silk thread you mentioned last time? I'd like to get some to try.
Mom, is dinner ready? We've just finished tidying up here, and the kids have been very well-behaved. How is Dad feeling today?

Hello Teacher Han, this is Ma Mingxuan's mother. I would like to inquire about Mingxuan's recent learning progress at school, especially in mathematics, as I have noticed he seems to be struggling with his homework.
Honey, are you still on the road? I told the kids about the new rules today, and they were quite understanding. Drive safely on your way back tonight. I've left some food for you in the pot.

Sister Zheng, I've checked the material list for the Double Ninth Festival handicraft corner activity. Colored paper, scissors, and glue are all sufficient, but the ribbon colors might not be complete. Would you like me to go and get some more this afternoon?
Mom, I'll arrive around two o'clock this afternoon. The weather is nice today, so I'll pick up some fruit on the way. How has Dad's leg been feeling these past couple of days?
Xiulan, your dad and I are both doing well, so there's no need to buy too many things. Your dad says his legs feel a bit more relaxed than yesterday. Drive carefully on the road and stay safe.
Mom, I'm home. Dr. Wang from the community praised me today for keeping detailed nursing records, saying it helps in adjusting Dad's rehabilitation plan. I'll come to the kitchen to help right away.

Honey, I have a medical checkup tomorrow morning and need to be at the hospital before 8 o'clock. Could you please drive Xuanxuan, Zhezhe, and Xinxin to school tomorrow morning? I'll pack their schoolbags tonight.

Chunmei, are you asleep? I just got the kids settled and am watching a movie to relax. It's been getting cold lately—has your mom's chronic leg pain been acting up? How is that knee brace you mentioned last time working out?
Mom, I made millet porridge, steamed buns, fried eggs, and ham for Zhiqiang and the kids this morning. They all enjoyed their meal very much. How has your appetite been lately?
Honey, breakfast is on the table. Remember to pick up Xuanxuan and Zhe Zhe from school this afternoon, don't forget. I'll go for a medical checkup at the hospital after dropping off the kids.
Mingzhe, I've checked your math homework. There are two incorrect problems, which I've circled. Please correct them yourself first, and then show them to me after you've made the changes.
Xinxin, I've placed today's calligraphy practice book on your desk. Take a break after finishing each page, and remember to keep your eyes at a proper distance.

Aunt Sun, this is Xiulan. I've noted down the pickling recipe you shared. I'd like to come by tomorrow morning to buy 20 jin of Chinese cabbage and 10 jin of green radish, along with coarse salt and Sichuan peppercorns. Would that be convenient for you?

Aunt Wu, I've reached the part of the bird's feathers in my embroidery and want to achieve that fluffy effect, but I'm not doing it well. What stitch do you think would be suitable? I'll take a photo to show you.

Thank you, Aunt Wu! I understand the method of combining seed embroidery and pine needle embroidery you mentioned. I'll practice on some scrap fabric first, and if I have any questions, I'll ask you again.

Sister Wang, I went for a physical examination this morning. The doctor said I have a bit of anemia and cervical strain, and advised me to take more care. Regarding the health exercises you mentioned last time, how exactly are they done?
Mingxuan, how is your homework coming along? Mom is cooking, and the spinach and lean meat are to help nourish you. Remember to rest your eyes after finishing your homework.
Sister, I bought some cabbage and radish this morning to make pickles. Would you like to make some too? I brought you some coarse salt and Sichuan peppercorns.

Dear, the parent-teacher conference is over. Teacher Yang said Mingzhe is very smart, but he tends to get distracted in class and his homework is a bit sloppy. She gave some suggestions, and I'll discuss them with you in detail when you get back.

Zhao Fang, it was a pleasure walking home together and chatting today. We can communicate more about the methods Teacher Yang mentioned and encourage each other. Let's work together on the matters concerning the children!

Mom, I attended the parent-teacher conference for Mingzhe today. The teacher said he is quick-witted but a bit careless. We'll discuss how to manage this when Zhiqiang comes home tonight. How are you and Dad doing?
Mom, I'll probably arrive around a quarter past nine. How is Dad feeling today? I've brought a notebook so we can discuss the care arrangements in more detail.
Mom, I'm all packed and ready. Shall we get going?
Alright, I've changed my clothes. I'm coming right now.
Mom, I've stewed spinach and pork liver soup and steamed red dates for tonight, both are good for nourishing the blood. You and Dad should come over for dinner. The kids miss you both.
Okay, I'll let your dad know that we'll come over tonight. He just mentioned he's been wanting to eat a meal you've cooked.
Honey, Mom and Dad are coming over for dinner tonight. I've made a blood-nourishing soup. About what time can you get home?
I'll try to get home before 6:30, but the traffic is a bit heavy.
Mom, the pickle jar and the pressing stone are all ready, and the Sichuan pepper salt has been stir-fried. We're just waiting for you to take charge.

Sister Xiuqin, for tomorrow's Double Ninth Festival community event, I've already taken stock of all the paper-cutting tools and washed the vests. Do you need me to come over early to help with the setup?
Auntie Sun, do you have fresh scallions available today? I'll come over to buy some in a little while, and I'll also pick up some eggs while I'm there.
Zhezhe, Mom is at the supermarket. How far have you gotten with your homework? Remember to check your math test paper yourself after finishing it.
Mom, I've finished buying groceries and will be home soon. Are you awake? We'll have tomato and egg noodles for dinner.
Aunt Sun, the spinach and pork liver today are both very fresh, thank you. I also want to stew a radish soup tonight. How much is the white radish?

Sister Xiuqin, I've finished embroidering that 'Flowers Blooming in Wealth and Honor' piece and just sent you a photo on WeChat. Could you tell me the exact street location of the framing shop you mentioned last time? Also, what's the approximate price? I'd like to go get it framed in the next couple of days.

Sister Xiuqin, thank you for recommending the framing shop information. I've taken note of it. I've been busy all day and just had a moment to check my phone. How has your handicraft work been going lately?
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan has a bit of a cough today. Please keep an eye on him. Thank you!
Zhe Zhe, Mom has dropped you off at school. Please listen carefully in class today, and wait for me to pick you up after school.
Mom, I got up this morning and made millet porridge and steamed buns. Since it's the Double Ninth Festival today, you and Dad should remember to eat something good and not work too hard.
Auntie Sun, are the spinach and pork liver fresh today? I'll come over to buy some later.
Dad, Mom, the event is over. I'll accompany you back on foot. Please wait for me at the entrance of the activity center.
Big sister, the community's Double Ninth Festival event was especially lively today. Mom was really happy and even praised me for my paper-cutting skills.
Honey, I'm having lunch at my parents' place. Remember to eat on time when you're out driving.

Sister Wang, the community event today was really lively. I performed paper-cutting and even received praise! Thanks to you for telling me about the honeycomb briquette news yesterday—I'm so grateful.
Honey, dinner is almost ready. We have stir-fried spinach with pork liver, steamed egg custard, and shredded potatoes. About what time will you be home?
Mom, how was Dad's condition last night? The community event today was quite successful. I was praised for my paper-cutting, and I'm really happy about it.
Mom, I'm up. I made noodles and milk for the kids' breakfast, and Zhiqiang has finished eating and left for work. How are you and Dad feeling today?

Sister Wang, regarding the back-patting technique I just taught you, remember to pat from the bottom upward, avoiding the spine. Keep your palm slightly cupped like a small bowl, and apply moderate pressure. Do this several times a day and encourage him to drink more water. This will help Uncle feel more comfortable.

Mom, I've mended the cuffs on Dad's sweater and the buttons on your coat. I've also organized the heavy clothes according to the season. You and Dad should try the new quilt at night. Let me know if it keeps you warm.

Mingxuan, I have checked your homework. Both your math and English assignments are completed very well. I have explained the word problem to Zhe Zhe, and he is now making corrections. Xin Xin has also finished her pinyin writing.
Mom, I just finished grocery shopping and saw fresh pork liver and spinach, so I'm planning to make a blood-nourishing dish for lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Aunt Sun, are the pork ribs fresh today? I'll come over to buy some later, please set aside two jin of good ones for me.
Mom, I'll ride the electric scooter over in a bit and should arrive around two-something. It's a bit windy, so you and Dad should stay at home, okay?
Mom, I just picked up Zhezhe and Xinxin. Zhezhe said he improved on his math test and is really happy about it. We're heading home now and will have dinner at home.
Dear Teacher Han, I am Ma Mingxuan's mother. Mingxuan has completed today's homework, and I have checked and signed it. Thank you for your concern.
Xinxin's drawing at kindergarten today is especially beautiful; it depicts our whole family. Let me take a picture and show you.
Mom, it's the weekend today. We just finished breakfast, and both Xuanxuan and Xinxin are at home. Could you and Dad come over for noodles with gravy at noon? I'll prepare more dishes.
Ms. Zhang, I just bought soy sauce, salt, and vinegar at your store using WeChat Pay. It was quite convenient for my first time using it. Thank you for teaching me how to use it.
Zhiqiang, I'm going to make noodles with sauce. Would you like tomato and egg sauce or meat sauce for lunch? I'll prepare it all at once.
Sister Xiuqin, I just saw a paper-cutting artwork depicting a dragon and phoenix bringing prosperity, and it was exquisitely crafted! Did you see it? I think it's definitely award-worthy.
Mom, is Dad feeling better from his dizziness today? I just finished the competition and am having lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Honey, I got the certificate for the Outstanding Participation Award! I'm on the bus now and should be home around four o'clock. How about we make dumplings tonight to celebrate?

Sister Wang, I just got back from the market and bought some pork ribs and sea bass. I plan to make a few nice dishes tonight to celebrate. The competition went quite smoothly today, and I came across a particularly creative piece of work. I'll share the details with you when we meet.

Sister Xiuqin, I was deeply moved after returning from today's competition, especially after seeing those traditional works that incorporate modern design, which gave me many new ideas. While flipping through the brochure before bed, I felt that we still have a long way to go in our craft. Let's keep working hard together!

Good afternoon, Sister Xiuqin. I've read the cultural center's brochure and was wondering if it's possible to take on some small custom embroidery orders, such as coasters or small wall hangings. With your extensive experience, do you think this is feasible? How should we price these items appropriately?

Good evening, Sister Zheng. I've been thinking about taking on some custom handmade work recently, such as making small pendants, coasters, and the like. I was wondering if there might be any demand or opportunities in our community or among people you know? I’d appreciate it if you could keep an eye out for me. Thank you!
Mom, I'm feeling much better today, and my nose isn't stuffy at all. I made millet porridge this morning, and the kids really enjoyed it. How have you and Dad been lately?

Shufen, I just passed by your store and saw the coal delivery truck. It might block the road in a while, so please be careful when handling incoming or outgoing goods. It looks like it's really going to rain today.

【Jinghai Coal Industry】Dear customer, your order for 1 ton of honeycomb briquettes (Order No. TJ20251028001) has been dispatched by driver Mr. Li (138xxxx5678) and is expected to arrive at 10:20. Please keep your phone accessible and be ready for delivery.

Sister Xiuqin, regarding the custom zodiac figurines you mentioned last time, I've sketched a few drafts and found that the time required is higher than expected, taking about 3-4 hours per piece. How do you typically price such orders on your end?
Mom, how is Dad feeling today? The coal delivery has been taken care of, so that's a weight off my mind. We're having noodles with gravy for dinner tonight.
Mingxuan, come straight home after school and don't play outside. Finish your homework first when you get back. We'll have your favorite noodles with gravy for dinner tonight.
Honey, are you finishing work early today? The noodles are almost ready. We're waiting for you to come home for dinner.
Mingzhe, stop watching TV and come help set the table. Dad will be back soon.

【Jinghai Community Clinic】Dear residents, the autumn and winter flu season is approaching. Our clinic offers influenza vaccinations. Please make an appointment in advance if you wish to receive the vaccine. Reply TD to unsubscribe.
Sister Xiuqin, the experience you shared is so helpful! I plan to start with small items, such as keychains with name abbreviations. Thank you for always helping me brainstorm ideas!
Mom, Mingxuan has finished breakfast and gone to school. It's windy today, so please make sure you and Dad dress warmly when you go out.
Sister Xiuqin, Sister Zheng has introduced a potential homestay collaboration. I would like to seek your advice on pricing and packaging strategies for the works. Please reply at your convenience.

Dear Manager Chen,

Hello, I am Ma Xiulan, a handicraft artisan, and I have long admired Guiyuan Homestay. I would like to discuss with you the possibility of integrating my handmade works into the homestay space. I have sent you a friend request along with some photos of my works. I look forward to your reply.
Mingzhe, Mom has gone to pick up your sister. Wait for me at the usual spot outside the school gate after class, and don't wander off.
Mom, I've picked up Mingzhe and Xinxin, and we're getting ready to head home now. For dinner, I've stir-fried shredded potatoes and tofu. Would you like to come over and join us for dinner tonight?

Sister, it's windy today, so please be careful on your way home from work. We will have a family meeting tonight to discuss Xuanxuan's school transition. If you have time, please also help us with your advice.
Mingxuan, your father said we need to have a family meeting tonight about your further education. Have you finished your homework? If so, let's gather in the living room at 8:30 to have a good talk.

Chunmei, the wind is too strong today, so I had to cancel my planned walk. How effective is that shoulder and neck pain relief patch you mentioned last time? Practicing the Eight-Section Brocade has helped me somewhat, but I'd like to try something else as well.
Mom, my neck is much better today, and I just finished the housework. Did Dad take his blood pressure medication on time? It's getting colder, so please make sure to keep warm.
Xiulan, I'm keeping an eye on your father's medication. Take care of yourself too, and don't overwork. Don't stress too much about Xuanxuan's school advancement; we can discuss it slowly.
Sister, are you busy? I'd like to talk with you about Mingxuan's school advancement. We had a family meeting last night and couldn't quite reach a decision.
Just finished the meeting, I'm free now. Go ahead, how is Mingxuan's academic performance currently? Does he plan to take the city-level exams or stay in Jinghai?

His academic performance is above average, and he wants to try his luck in the city. We are worried that he might not discipline himself well in a boarding school and are also concerned about the high expenses. Fen'er, how did you choose a school for Liangliang back then?
Sister Wang, are you free this afternoon? I've just pickled some dried radish and would like to bring some for you to try.

Dear Manager Chen, I am Ma Xiulan. Regarding the handmade collaboration, I have some physical photos of completed works on hand. If it's convenient for you, I can send them to you via WeChat later for your reference? I look forward to your feedback.
Mom, did you make soup tonight? It's gotten colder today, so please keep warm, you and Dad.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan will be playing basketball after school today and may return home a bit later. I'm informing you in advance. Thank you for your understanding.

Sister Xiuqin, I have just taken photos of "Autumn Scenery of Jinghai" and "Twin Lotus Flowers on One Stalk." The lighting and details are quite clear. Please take a look when it's convenient and share your feedback.
Zhe Zhe's Mom: Ming Zhe's Mom, I'll pick up Ming Zhe and Xin Xin this afternoon and also get the express delivery. Don't worry.
Honey, dinner is almost ready. We have braised pork ribs and steamed perch. What time do you think you'll be home?
Mom, the kids have all gone to bed today, and I'm getting ready to rest as well. How has your blood pressure been lately? Remember to take your medicine on time.
Aunt Sun, are the chives and pork filling fresh today? I'll be there around 11:30. Please set aside one jin of chives and two jin of pork filling from the front leg for me. Thank you!

Hello, I am Ma Xiulan. message_content: Zhiqiang, during our evening walk, I will provide you with a detailed explanation of the savings situation for October and share some thoughts regarding Mingxuan's high school entrance exam next year.

Chunmei, last time you mentioned wanting to learn how to make electronic photo albums. My niece came to teach me today, and it's actually quite simple. If you have time, why not come to my place another day and I'll show you how?
Mom, I simply stir-fried some greens and made tomato and egg soup for lunch. The kids finished everything. What did you have for lunch?
Zhe Zhe, have you finished your homework? If you have, go take a nap right away so you'll be energetic in the afternoon.

Hello Teacher Han, I am Ma Mingxuan's mother. I would like to inquire if there are any upcoming lectures or open day events at the school regarding the transition from primary to middle school. Thank you.
Auntie Sun, is the pork belly fresh today? I'll be there around six-thirty. Could you please save me half a kilogram with a good mix of lean and fat? Thank you!
Mom, dinner is almost ready. We have Moo Shu Pork, Vinegar-Glazed Cabbage, and millet porridge. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
Xiulan: We had noodles for dinner, simple and convenient. You two enjoy your meal, no need to wait for us. Has Zhe Zhe finished his homework?

Elder sister, I plan to take Dad to the Chaoyang Street Community Hospital to get medicine next week. You mentioned last time that you know Dr. Wang there. Would it be convenient for you to share his contact information with me?
Chunmei, where are you? The tea is already brewed, just waiting for you to taste the new Jin Jun Mei I bought.
Xiulan, I just parked the car and will be downstairs in a moment. The jujube paste cake is still warm!
Mom, have Xuanxuan and Zhezhe arrived at school safely? It's windy today, so please ride slowly and be careful when you take Xinxin and Zhezhe to school.
Zhe Zhe, I'll cook tomato and egg noodles for you at noon and heat up a few steamed buns. Come straight home after school and don't dawdle on the way.
Sis, I went to the market this morning and bought some groceries. I plan to make stir-fried pork with green peppers and tofu soup for dinner. How have you been lately? Is Mom doing well?

Sis, I've been thinking about that community embroidery order this afternoon, and the more I consider it, the more I feel it's a great opportunity, but I'm also worried I might not do it well. You have more experience, could you spare some time to help me think it through?
Zhe Zhe, Mom has finished dropping off your sister and is now heading to your school. I should arrive at the school gate around 7:45. Please wait for me at the usual spot.
Mom, I went to the community this morning and secured that embroidery order, and bought some materials. Zhe Zhe will be back for lunch at noon. What did you have for lunch?

Hello, is this the Chaoyang Street Community Hospital in Jinghai District? I would like to inquire about the schedule and cost for the influenza vaccination, as well as whether an elderly person with a history of COPD can receive the vaccine. Thank you.
contactName: Jinghai District Chaoyang Street Community Hospital

message_content: Mom, I was busy all day today. I negotiated an embroidery order and also received an invitation to be a community volunteer. The whole family is very supportive. Are you and Dad both doing well? It's getting cold, so please take extra care to stay warm.

Mom, I made millet porridge this morning and steamed some buns. You and Dad can come directly to the kitchen to eat after getting up. The porridge is kept warm in the rice cooker. It's cold outside, so remember to wear more clothes.
Zhe Zhe, Mom is cooking now. Come straight home after school, lunch will be ready soon.
【Shufen Convenience Store】Your group purchase of 30 discounted eggs has arrived. Please pick them up at the store by 17:00 today using pickup code A12.
Mom, Mingzhe and Xinxin are both home and doing their homework. How are things on your end?
Everything is fine. Your father is playing chess downstairs. Keep an eye on the child's writing posture and make sure they don't sit too close.
【JD Daojia】The apples you purchased are being delivered by courier Mr. Wang (Phone: 138****1234) and are expected to arrive before 18:50. Please keep your phone accessible.
Sister Wang, look at this Arowana peanut oil. The product page says the second item is half price for the first 500 customers. How do I claim this coupon? I've sent you the link.

That one needs to be snatched at midnight, and it's hard to get. Look at Vinda's tissue paper—there's a discount of 80 off for purchases over 199, which is quite practical. I plan to stock up on some.
Elder sister, what should we buy for our parents during the Double Eleven shopping festival? I noticed that thermal underwear is on sale.
Dear Teacher Yang, I am Ma Xiulan, Ma Mingzhe's mother. Mingzhe has a bit of a cough today. Please keep an eye on him, and if he feels unwell, feel free to contact me at any time. Thank you!

Mom, I just signed the community embroidery agreement, and it went quite smoothly. I'll be able to earn 500 yuan. Zhe Zhe will come home for lunch at noon, and I've bought meat and vegetables. We'll wait for Zhi Qiang to come back in the evening to have dinner together.
Ms. Zheng, have you received the sample photos? I have completed the embroidery on my end. Could you please check if the stitching and colors meet the requirements?
Sister Xiuqin, the embroidery thread brand you recommended last time works really well. I'm preparing the fabric for a new pendant tonight. Are you working on any new patterns recently?
Zhe Zhe, stop watching TV. Go brush your teeth and wash your face now, and get ready for bed.
Xinxin, your little toothbrush and towel are all set. Go wash up now, and Mom will come check on you in a bit.
Honey, I've just banked the coal stove in the living room. Be careful not to touch it when you come back. I've left a crack in the window for ventilation.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan is coughing a bit today. Please keep an eye on him. Thank you!

Sister Zheng, the first outline of the "Fu" character pendant for the community order was completed this morning. Work will continue this afternoon, and the first batch is expected to be finished tomorrow.

【Jinghai Community Service Center】Your community handicraft order (Order No. SH20251107001) has been confirmed. Please proceed with production as scheduled and contact Specialist Zheng Xiuying upon completion.
Zhe Zhe, Mom made your favorite sweet and sour cabbage and fried sausage for lunch. Come straight home to eat after school.
Xinxin, Mom will pick you up from kindergarten around 4:10, and then we'll go get the vaccine. Be brave.
Hello Dr. Wang, I will bring my daughter Ma Yuxin around 4:30 p.m. for the influenza vaccination. Please reserve some time for us.
Shufen, I'm going to the supermarket later to buy laundry detergent and light soy sauce. Please save two bottles of Blue Moon Bright White & Color Enhancement for me. Thank you!
Mom, we made sweet and sour pork tenderloin, spinach, and tofu soup tonight to celebrate the success of our savings plan. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
Big sister, I just finished cleaning the kitchen and am watching TV with the kids. How have you been lately?
Mom, I steamed the red bean buns you love this morning and also made soy milk. If you and Dad haven't had breakfast yet, come over and join me.
Honey, thank you for washing the dishes today. I need to focus on finishing the orders this morning. What would you like for lunch? I'll go grocery shopping in a little while.

Sister Zheng, regarding the embroidery pendant order you introduced, I have already completed the main part this morning. I will start outlining it this afternoon, and it is expected to be fully finished tomorrow. Are there any specific requirements from the client's side?

Aunt Sun, are the Chinese cabbage and green radishes on your stall fresh today? I'll come to buy around 11 o'clock. Please reserve 30 jin of cabbage and 10 jin of radishes for me, and make sure they are large ones.

Sister Xiuqin, I plan to pickle the cabbage in the jar this afternoon. Last time you mentioned the ratio of salt to cabbage is half a jin of salt for every ten jin of cabbage, right? I bought twenty jin this time. Is one jin of salt enough?
Mom, we stewed pork ribs for dinner tonight. Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin had a great time playing in the park this afternoon. What did you and Dad have for dinner?
Mom, my back is a bit sore today, but I felt much better after my morning exercise. Did you and Dad sleep well last night? Remember to take your blood pressure medication on time.
Dad, we've arrived at the community hospital. There aren't many people here, so we'll be able to get the shot soon. Did you remember to bring your ID card and medical insurance card?
Zhezhe, Mom is making tomato and egg noodles for lunch. Please come straight home after school to eat. Be careful on your way.

Sister, have you been busy lately? I accompanied Dad to get his vaccine this morning. Mom still doesn't seem to be doing well, and I'm feeling a bit unsettled. I'd like to find some time to talk with you.
Mom, I had lunch with Zhe Zhe today and we talked about his school. What did you have for lunch? I'll be doing some crafts at home this afternoon, but I'm still thinking of you.

Sister Zheng, I have completed the filling of two 'Fu' character patterns for the embroidery order this morning and will continue working on the pendants in the afternoon. Could you please let me know when this batch of goods is needed? I need to arrange my schedule accordingly.
Okay, Xiulan, no rush. It's fine as long as it's completed by next Monday. The client said they are very satisfied with the pattern and want you to take your time to ensure quality.
Zhe Zhe, Mom made your favorite shredded potatoes with green peppers and spinach tofu soup for lunch. We'll eat around 11:30, so come straight home after school.
Dad, I'll be coming over around 2:40 p.m. I've brought some cabbage and sweet pickled garlic from home. How has Mom's appetite been lately? Is there anything you need me to bring along?
Daughter, your mother's appetite is still fine, but she keeps saying she wants to go out for a walk. There's no need to bring anything else. Drive carefully on the way.
Mom, I made sweet and sour pork ribs, stir-fried spinach, and scrambled eggs with green peppers tonight, and the kids were all eager to eat. Have you and Dad had dinner yet?

Good morning, Sister Zheng. I have started filling the 'Fu' character ornaments here. The red embroidery thread appears to have a slight color difference compared to the sample. Could you please check whether it is due to lighting or if adjustments are needed?
Mom, I'm going to pick up Xuanxuan, Zhezhe, and Xinxin. I'm planning to make Moo Shu Pork for dinner. What would you and Dad like to eat tonight? I can bring it over on my way.
Zhiqiang, dinner is almost ready. We have Moo Shu Pork and Vinegar-Glazed Cabbage. About what time will you and our eldest son be home?
Mom, my back feels a bit stiff today. How has your back been lately? I've made some millet porridge. Would you and Dad like to come over for breakfast?
Honey, drive slowly and be careful on the road. I fried two sunny-side-up eggs for your breakfast; make sure to eat them both. If you plan to come back for lunch, please let me know in advance.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan has a bit of a cough today. Please keep an eye on him, and if it becomes severe, please contact me promptly. Thank you!

Mr. Yang, Mingzhe forgot to bring his math workbook this morning. I will bring it over when I pick him up this afternoon. Could you please let him know to borrow a classmate's workbook to use during class for now?
Auntie Sun, are the tofu and spinach fresh today? I'll be there around 9 o'clock. Please save me a pound of soft tofu and a bunch of spinach. Thank you!

Sister Zheng, I have finished sewing and sealing the 'Fu' character ornaments and lantern pendants from this morning. A total of 8 pieces have been completed. Would it be convenient for me to deliver them to you this afternoon, or would you prefer to come and pick them up?
Mingxuan, have you finished your homework? Dinner is almost ready—it's chicken stew with potatoes. Come out and eat as soon as you're done.
Zhe Zhe, have you checked the last question on your math homework? Mom will help you look at it in a moment.
Xinxin, have you finished reading your pinyin cards? Come to the kitchen to find Mom when you're done.

Mom, I had an argument with Mingxuan today and I feel really upset. I don't know how to manage him anymore.
Mom, the weather is nice today. I'll pick you up later, and we can go to Xishuangtang for a walk. Please dress warmly.
Zhiqiang, breakfast is ready. There's millet porridge and custard buns. You can have it after you drop off the kids. Don't let it get cold.
Mom: Xiulan, your dad and I will come over around 10 a.m. to see the kids.
Mom, I exercised this morning and my shoulders and neck feel much more comfortable now. Is your back still hurting recently? Remember to apply the medicated plaster on time.
Chunmei, I'll be at home this afternoon, you can come directly. I've brewed the jasmine tea you like.
Sister Xiulan, I'm heading out now and should arrive in about ten minutes. I've brought you some hawthorn cake I made.
Mingxuan, we have guests coming this afternoon. You and your younger siblings should stay in your room and do your homework quietly.
Me: Let's celebrate tonight. I've made braised pork ribs and steamed shrimp with garlic vermicelli. I'm waiting for you and the kids to come home for dinner!

I: Sister Xiuqin, I've already started working on today's embroidery order. Using the newly learned backstitch technique, the edge-locking efficiency has improved significantly, and it should be completed by tomorrow.

Zhou Xiuqin: That's wonderful, Xiulan! The client is pressing for the progress, so I'm relieved to hear that you're moving quickly. Just make sure not to overwork yourself, and remember to rest your eyes.

Mom, I made shredded pork with green peppers and shredded potatoes with vinegar for lunch. What did you and Dad have for lunch?
Mingxuan, has your father finished talking with you? We are doing this for your own good, and we hope you can understand. What would you like to eat tonight? Mom will cook for you.
Sister Xiuqin, today I used the backstitch embroidery method you taught me for hemming, and it was indeed both fast and neat. I completed three pendants. How is the progress on your orders?
Mom, we tried out the new rules at home today, and the kids were quite cooperative. How are you and Dad doing? It's cold outside, so please take care to stay warm.
Xiufen, we tried implementing the mobile phone usage rules at home today. It went fairly smoothly at the beginning, but I still feel a bit uncertain. How have you been lately?
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan left home a bit late today and might be a few minutes late. Sorry for the inconvenience.
Teacher Yang, Mingzhe has a bit of a cough today. Could you please remind him to drink more warm water during the break? Thank you.
Aunt Sun, are the pork belly and shiitake mushrooms fresh today? I'll probably come over around 8:30.
Mom, the temperature dropped today. Please make sure you and Dad wear more when you go out to buy groceries, so you don't catch a cold.
Sister Zheng, I have cut all the fabric and patterns for the New Year ornaments. When would be convenient for you? I can bring over the first batch of semi-finished products for your review.

Mom, I'll come pick you up after I finish lunch and tidy up a bit. I should arrive around one o'clock. Please have your scarf and water bottle ready—it's windy outside today.
Dear, I'm taking Mom to Xitang Village this afternoon and will be back before dinner. I've prepared the ingredients for the kids' dinner and left them in the fridge. Please handle the cooking.
Mom, look how well this photo turned out. The sunlight on your face makes you look especially kind. I'll send it to the family group chat later so Dad and the others can see it too.
Mingzhe, I'm cooking right now. Please do your homework by yourself first. If you encounter any difficulties, you can ask me later.
Me: Honey, I've finished shopping and am going to pick up Xinxin now. About what time will you be home?
Chunmei, I just finished the housework and noticed more white hairs in the mirror. It's really worrying. What was that dietary remedy you mentioned last time? Or would it be simpler to just dye it?
Mingxuan, I was really happy to hear you talk about school during dinner tonight. Feel free to share any interesting things with me anytime.
Sisters, I received a large order for 30 pendants today! I'm so happy! Thank you all for your continuous support.

Sister Xiuqin, I was embroidering the character 'Fu' on the second batch of pendants this morning. The gold thread you mentioned last time works really well, and I'll share some with you later.

Mom, the kids are all asleep, and I'm about to soak my feet and rest. Thank you for agreeing to look after the children today. Next month, Zhiqiang and I will be able to have breakfast out with peace of mind. You should also get some rest early.

Sister Wang, I'm all set and ready to head out for the lecture. What time are you planning to leave home? Shall we meet at the entrance of the community center?

Mom, I made millet porridge this morning, steamed some buns, and fried a couple of sunny-side-up eggs. Did you and Dad have breakfast? If not, I can have Zhiqiang bring some over.

Xiulan: Good morning! Your dad and I just finished eating. He made noodles. No need to send anything over, just make sure you eat well. It's windy today, so dress the kids warmly when sending them to school.

Sis, we'll come over for dinner tonight. I've bought minced meat and vegetables to make dumplings. How has Dad's blood pressure been lately?
Honey, I'm all packed and ready to head out to pick up the kids. Will you be on time?

Mom, we just picked up the kids and are planning to come see you and Dad in a little while. We'd like to have noodles with gravy for dinner, and I've brought meat and vegetables.
Mom, we're heading out now. We'll walk there and should arrive in about 20 minutes. You and Dad can rest first.
Mom, we've arrived downstairs and are coming up right now.
Okay, the door is open. Come right in.
Elder sister, I just arrived at our parents' house. Mom said my newly dyed hair looks nice and makes me appear younger. How have you been recently?
Mom, it's the weekend today. We made millet porridge, steamed buns, and fried eggs. Xuanxuan, Zhezhe, and Xinxin are all up and enjoying their breakfast. Have you and Dad had breakfast yet?

Hello, big sister! Hope you're having a good weekend. We had a hearty breakfast at home today, and the kids are all here. How are things on your end? It's getting cold, so please remember to keep warm.
Sister Xiuqin, please come to my house at 2:30 p.m. We can chat while doing some handicrafts. I have prepared some tea and snacks, and I look forward to meeting you!
Mom, breakfast is almost ready. There's millet porridge, fried eggs, and steamed buns. You can come eat as soon as you finish washing up.
Elder sister, are you free to come over for lunch at home tomorrow, Sunday? I'm planning to prepare a few dishes so we can get together.

Xinxin: Mom, I've brushed my teeth. Can you tell me the story "The Little Horse Crosses the River" today?

Sister Zheng, I have completed and inspected all 30 embroidery pendants for the community performance. The loose threads have been trimmed. Please let me know when it would be convenient for me to deliver them to you.
Mom, we made braised potato slices with pork for dinner. Have you and Dad eaten yet? It's getting cold, so please remember to keep warm.
Mingxuan, I have finished checking your homework. Your Chinese composition is well written. It would be even better if you could provide more detailed steps for the last math problem.
Mingzhe, did you understand the math problem we just went over? If not, I can explain it to you again tomorrow morning.
Xinxin, your handmade bunny is really great! You can take it to kindergarten tomorrow to show your teacher. Go to bed early.

Sister Xiuqin, I have finished the hemming for that batch of pendants today. I'll bring them over for you to check when we meet tomorrow afternoon. Have there been any changes to the specific requirements for the performance on your side?
Honey, the kids are asleep. I've finished soaking my feet and am about to rest as well. Did you pack everything you need for your trip tomorrow? Please drive safely.
Mom, I steamed some buns this morning. I'll bring them over for you and Dad later, and I can also help you with the vegetable prep. Do you feel like making dumplings today?
Xiulan: Good, we happen to have chives at home. Drive carefully on the way, and dress warmly—it's cold outside.

Sister Wang, the walnut cookies you made are really delicious. The kids are all scrambling to eat them. Thank you! I made a few more ornaments for the community performance tonight, and I'll show them to you tomorrow.

Xiulan, please don't stand on ceremony with the walnut cookies. I'm glad you like them. There's no rush for the pendant; take your time with it. Your health comes first. I'll come to see you tomorrow afternoon.
Sister, it's been dry lately, so you and brother-in-law should remember to drink more water. Everything is fine on my end, and the children are behaving well.
Honey, thank you for your hard work today in helping check the homework. I feel much more at ease now that Xuanxuan has finished his homework. Please get some rest early.
Mom, I made noodles with gravy this morning, and Xuanxuan, Zhezhe, and Xinxin all ate quite a bit. What did you and Dad have for breakfast? It's cold, so please make sure to keep warm.
Hello Teacher Han, how has Mingxuan been performing at school recently? As the weather turns colder, are the children dressed warmly enough in the classroom?

Honey, I've got all the dishes prepared here. About what time can you get home?
Mom, after practicing Baduanjin this morning, my shoulders feel much more comfortable. How is your frozen shoulder lately? Has it improved?
Honey, the kids have all finished breakfast. Xuanxuan and Zhezhe are dressed warmly, and Yuxin's hair is done. You can set off for work without worry.
Xuanxuan, it's cloudy today. Go straight home after school and don't linger outside.
Hello Teacher Han, Mingxuan has a slight cough today. Please keep an eye on him. Thank you!
Mom, I just finished steaming some buns, and they turned out really well. I'll bring a lunchbox over for you and Dad, and I should arrive around one o'clock.

Sister Xiuqin, sorry to bother you. I'm currently preparing the 'Golden Carp Winding Around the Fu Character' embroidery for the community craft market, but I'm uncertain about the color scheme next to the gold thread. May I ask if you have any good suggestions?
Honey, I'm heading out now to pick up Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin from school. About what time will you be home tonight?
Zhe Zhe, Mom is cooking in the kitchen. Please start your homework on your own. If you come across any questions you don't know, mark them first, and Mom will check them later.
Good morning, Sister Xiulan! How was your morning exercise today? I also tried Baduanjin yesterday, and my shoulders feel much more comfortable now.
Mom, the kids have all been safely dropped off at school, so you can rest assured. It's quite windy today, so please make sure you and Dad dress warmly when you go out.
Aunt Wu, I just bought tangerine and bright yellow silk threads at Qiaoshou Workshop to embroider a geometric lotus pattern. Is the gold thread you mentioned last time still in stock at the shop?

Chunmei, are you on your lunch break? I just took a short nap and feel much more refreshed. Last time you mentioned wanting to learn how to embroider the "Magpie on Plum Blossom" pattern. I am currently working on it, so come over to my place when you have time, and I'll show you how to start the stitching.

Sister Wang, I really enjoyed our chat just now. Regarding the community craft market you mentioned last time, what was the exact date again? I've finished embroidering my piece 'Golden Carp Woven with the Character Fu' and would like to bring it along to have a look.
Mom: Sweetie, your dad told me you can pay utility bills with your phone now? How capable! Could you teach me how to pay the electricity bill for our home later?
Me: Shufen, thank you for teaching me how to pay my phone bill today. I tried it at noon, and it worked! I also bought that soy sauce brand you mentioned last time, and it really does taste good.

Me: Mom, I'll probably arrive at your place around two o'clock. I brought the unfinished embroidery piece "Magpie on Plum Branch," but I'm not satisfied with how the wings turned out. I'd like you to take a look and give me your opinion.
Me: Mom, I'm about to head out to pick up Mingzhe and Yuxin. I should be back around five o'clock. What would you like for dinner? I can pick something up on the way.
Me: Sis, we made sweet and sour pork tenderloin at home today to celebrate that I've saved up some education funds. The kids are all very happy. How have you been lately?
Liu Chunmei: Xiulan, are you asleep? My son is stuck on a math problem, and I remember your Mingxuan is good at math. Would it be convenient for him to take a look? I'll send you the problem.

Mom, it's raining today. I made millet porridge for the kids this morning. Xuanxuan has been adjusting his sleep schedule well lately and looks much more energetic. Please make sure you and Dad stay warm over there and avoid catching a cold.
Honey, it was raining heavily this morning. I've already taken Xinxin and ZheZhe to school, and everything went smoothly. Please drive carefully on your way to work and stay safe.
Mom, where are you? Breakfast is ready. We have millet porridge, steamed buns, and fried eggs. We're just waiting for you to join us.
I'm heading out. I've checked Xuanxuan's Chinese textbook, and it's in his backpack. I might have to work overtime tonight, so don't wait for me for dinner.
Mom, I forgot to bring my colored pencils for art class, and I need them for the first period this afternoon. Could you please bring them to the school security office?
Sister, I've drafted a preliminary menu for the weekend gathering, which includes braised crucian carp and potatoes with braised pork. Do you think we need to add any other dishes?
Sister Xiuqin, good afternoon. I have reviewed the lotus pattern you sent, and the geometric line design is truly ingenious. May I reference it when refining the sketch this afternoon?

【Industrial and Commercial Bank of China】Dear customer, a time deposit of 5,000.00 yuan was completed on your savings card ending with 8899 at 15:20 on December 12. The current balance is XXXXX.XX yuan. For details, please log in to the mobile banking app.
contactName: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China

message_content: Mom, I just checked my mobile banking app and saw that the fixed-term education reserve fund for Xuanxuan has been successfully set up. I feel much more at ease now. How have you and Dad been doing lately?
Xiulan, I'm free tomorrow afternoon. I've finished drawing the embroidery pattern we talked about last time. Would you like to come over and take a look?
Honey, I just picked up Zhezhe and Xinxin and we're on our way back. About what time will you be home tonight? For dinner, I'm planning to make stir-fried spinach and scrambled eggs with tomatoes.
Elder sister, the children have all gone to bed, and the house is finally quiet. How is your back pain? Has it improved since last time? How did you feel after using the medicated patch I sent you?

Good morning, Mom! The weather is nice today. I'll go out with Zhiqiang in a little while to have breakfast and buy some groceries. I'll come back to cook lunch at noon. The children are at home doing their homework, so don't worry.
Good morning, big sister! The weather is really nice today. Zhiqiang and I are planning to go out for a walk. How have you been lately? Are Mom and Dad doing well?
Chunmei, come over for tea at 2 p.m. The sunflower seeds are already roasted, just waiting for you!
Me: Honey, you've worked hard washing the dishes. I've finished wiping the table over here. Have you checked the children's homework yet?

Ma Zhiqiang: Honey, I've washed the dishes. The kids have finished their homework. Mingxuan said he couldn't figure out one problem, so I explained it to him. Come watch TV with me once you're done tidying up.

Me: Sister Xiuqin, sorry to bother you. The lines of this geometric pattern I embroidered always lack smoothness. I've recorded a video and would appreciate it if you could take a look when you have time and offer some guidance.
Mom, I've dropped off Zhe Zhe and Xin Xin, and I'm now on my way to your place. I should arrive in about 12 minutes. How is Dad feeling this morning?
Mom, I checked Dad's medication. He needs to take it half an hour after lunch. Please don't forget to remind him. I'll cook the dough drop soup until it's extra soft in a little while.
Xiulan: Sis, I just finished bathing Dad at our parents' house, and my back is a bit sore. What brand was that medicated patch you mentioned last time?
Hello Teacher Han, I am Ma Xiulan, Ma Mingxuan's mother. I have already set off for the school to attend the parent-teacher meeting and expect to arrive in about 20 minutes.
Mom, I'm out between classes and will probably arrive at the library entrance around 9. Where are you?
I'll be waiting for you right at the library entrance. Just come straight over.
Mom, dinner is ready. There's congee, sweet and sour cabbage, Chinese sausage, and steamed buns. Mingxuan is back too, so come over and eat.

Fen'er, how about coming to my place for a family meal this Sunday at noon? Bring your parents along as well. I plan to make steamed buns, noodles with gravy, and sweet and sour pork. What do you think?
Sis, no problem! Our family and our parents will all come over at noon on Sunday. I'll bring some seafood to add to the meal. By the way, is your back still hurting? Make sure to get plenty of rest.

Sister Wang, thank you for sharing the recipe with me on the balcony earlier; I've noted it down. You mentioned last time that you wanted to see the new embroidery pattern on my shoe insoles. If you're free this afternoon, you're welcome to come over to my place. Coincidentally, my childhood friend Chunmei will also be visiting.
Chunmei, please come to my house for tea at 1:30 p.m. I have just bought some jasmine tea, and the weather is lovely today. We can chat over a cup of tea.
Chunmei, I'll be at home this afternoon. I've prepared tea and melon seeds, and I'm just waiting for you to arrive. Take your time on the way.
Xiulan, thank you for the tea and snacks today. I feel much better after chatting with you. Since you have back problems, remember to rest more and avoid sitting for too long while working.
Honey, I'll show you a few stretching exercises taught by Dr. Wang when you come back tonight. I think they're quite helpful.

Mom, we practiced the Eight-Section Brocade in the yard at seven this morning. I taught you the section called "Regulating the Spleen and Stomach by Raising One Arm." The movements are not difficult and are particularly beneficial for the digestive system. Remember to dress warmly to avoid catching a chill.

Mom, I steamed buns and cooked millet porridge for breakfast, and there's also the pickled radish we made at home. Breakfast will be ready at 7:40. Please come to the kitchen with Xuanxuan to eat, so he can go to school afterward.

Aunt Sun, I will arrive at the market around nine o'clock this morning. I would like to buy some fresh vegetables and pork, and also look for thick cotton-padded jackets and jeans for the children. Do you have suitable ones available?

Sister Xiuqin, I was mending clothes at home this morning. Regarding the stitching technique you mentioned last time for repairing elbow wear on sweaters, how exactly do you wrap the thread? I'm mending my husband's sweater and want to make it more durable.
Honey, I'll just have a simple lunch by myself. I've already taken out the meat filling for dumplings to thaw. Would you like cabbage and pork filling or leek and egg filling for dinner tonight?
Xiulan, you've worked hard making dumplings today. After tidying up the kitchen, take a good rest. Tomorrow is the weekend, and I'll come back early to help.
Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, Xinxin, it's time to take a bath. After bathing, prepare the clothes you'll wear tomorrow and place them by the bedside. Stop watching TV now.

Sister Xiuqin, I've just completed my new embroidery piece! It blends traditional floral motifs with modern geometric patterns, and I feel a real sense of accomplishment. I'm sharing it with you to have a look.
【Happy Family】Xiulan: The children are all asleep. I just finished my embroidery work and will share it in the group chat for everyone to see. Good night!

Mom, I made braised pork ribs, scrambled eggs with tomatoes, stir-fried cabbage with vinegar, and seaweed egg drop soup for lunch. You and the kids should all come back to eat. We'll start around 12 o'clock.
Alright, I'll be right back. Your dad said there's a meal provided at his workplace at noon, so he won't be coming home for lunch.

Sister Xiuqin, regarding the method for binding off the woolen hat you asked about last time, I've recorded a short video and sent it to you via WeChat. Please take a look and see if it makes sense to you.
Fen'er, come over to our house tomorrow noon for a dumpling gathering. The meat and vegetables are all prepared. Bring your husband and the kids. Let's have a great time together!

Sister Xiuqin, the hat I knitted for our dad is finally finished tonight. The stitches are very tight, and I'll show it to you tomorrow. How is the progress on the scarf you're knitting for your aunt?
Mom, about what time will you and Dad arrive today? I just finished breakfast here and am about to start kneading the dough.
Fen'er, have you set off yet? Mom and the others are almost here. I've already prepared the filling, just waiting for the seafood you're bringing.
Sis, we just left and are stuck on Jingwen Road now. It'll probably take another half hour. We've got the shrimp and crabs with us, don't worry.
Mom, I've arrived. I'm at the unit door downstairs. Should you come down to open it, or shall I go up directly?

Chunmei, we have guests over for dinner at home today. Since you mentioned last time that you wanted to learn how to make sweet and sour pork tenderloin, I prepared it today and took step-by-step photos. I'll send them to you later.
Great, Sister Xiulan! Please go ahead with your work, no rush. I'll also give it a try later and show you the results when I'm done.

Dr. Wang, hello. My father came to visit me today, and I massaged the Fengchi acupoint for him as you mentioned last time. He said he felt much more comfortable. I would like to ask how many times a day it is appropriate to massage this acupoint?
Zhiqiang, I just had a simple bowl of noodles for lunch. What would you like for dinner? I can stop by the store on my way back after the meeting this afternoon.
Honey, I'm making braised pork with cabbage for dinner tonight. We'll eat around 6:30, so come straight home after work.
Ma Zhiqiang: Received. I still have some things to handle and should be able to get home around 6:20.
Zhou Xiuqin: Xiulan, how did the community meeting go today? Did everyone like your idea about the reed New Year paintings?
Mom, breakfast is ready. It's millet and red date porridge along with steamed buns. Please bring the children to eat soon.
Aunt Sun, I would like to come to your place this morning to buy some pork ribs and potatoes. I will arrive around ten o'clock. Could you please set aside some good ones for me?

Sister Zheng, I've taken a preliminary look at the material list for the community decoration. The gold thread and embroidery fabric are both sufficient. Would tomorrow morning be convenient for you? I'd like to meet with you in person to review the specific division of tasks.
Hello Teacher Han, how did Mingzhe perform during the school rehearsal today? He came back extremely excited, saying he was the little lead role.

Sister Wang, I was a bit too shy to chat more downstairs earlier. Regarding the new vendor you mentioned at the vegetable market, could you tell me the exact location? I'd like to check it out tomorrow as well.
Sis, what was the name of that plaster you mentioned last time for back pain? I've been tidying up the house these past couple of days and my back feels a bit off, so I'd like to try it.

Sister Xiuqin, I've checked the link you sent about the stitching technique, and it's indeed suitable for outlining, the effect will definitely be good. I'll try it tomorrow and bring the finished piece to show you the day after tomorrow.

Sister Xiuqin, I've saved the pattern images you shared—they're truly beautiful and carry the charm of traditional craftsmanship. I'll bring them to the community activity room the day after tomorrow, and we can brainstorm together how to incorporate them into our decorations.
Mom, there's an orange haze warning today. Please don't go outside. I'll come over to see you later, and we can practice Baduanjin at home.
Mom, Xuanxuan and Zhe Zhe have been safely dropped off at school, so you can rest assured. The smog is heavy today, so please keep the windows closed at home.

Honey, Zhe Zhe's school needs props for the New Year's Day party. I just went to the stationery store and bought colored cardstock, glitter, and other materials. I'll show you when I get home tonight.

Sister Xiuqin, while taking inventory, I noticed that the red rice paper and gold embroidery thread are running low. Do you have any surplus on your end, or do you know which store has a more complete stock?
Auntie Sun, are the snow pears and silver ear mushrooms fresh today? I'd like to make some pear soup.
Mom, I've made some pear soup and will bring it over tonight. Will you and Dad be at home?
Mingxuan, have you finished your homework? I'll come check it after I finish cleaning the kitchen.
Zhe Zhe, I've put all the props next to your schoolbag. Don't forget to bring them tomorrow. Xin Xin, have you brushed your teeth? It's time to get ready for a story.
Mom, I made millet porridge, steamed some buns, and boiled eggs. Have you had breakfast yet? If not, come over and join us. Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, and Xinxin are all here.
Me: Zhiqiang, I've made braised pork, stir-fried cabbage, and spinach tofu soup for dinner. About what time will you be home? The kids are waiting.

Me: Sister Xiuqin, I finished cutting the sample of the window grilles we decided on today in the evening. The effect is particularly good, and I've already pasted it on the living room glass. I've posted photos in the group for you to see. Working on it over the weekend gives me more confidence.

Zhou Xiuqin: Xiulan, I've seen the photo! It's truly beautiful, and the integration of the character "Fu" is ingenious. I've also matched the embroidery threads on my end. I'll head over early this weekend.

Me: Chunmei, are you asleep? The props for Xuanxuan's school New Year's Day performance today were quite complicated, and I spent a long time helping him with them. How is your child's performance preparation going?

Mom: Xiulan, are you asleep? Did you eat dumplings today for the Winter Solstice? I saw the weather forecast says it will be even colder tomorrow, so dress warmly when you pick up and drop off the kids. Make sure Xuanxuan, Zhe Zhe, and Xinxin are all tucked in properly.
Mom, I've dropped off Xuanxuan and Xinxin. I'm heading to the market now and will be back by noon.

Director Zheng, the paper-cutting production has commenced smoothly this morning. The initial batch of samples shows satisfactory results. We will continue with batch production this afternoon and expect to complete the majority of the work by tomorrow.
Okay, Xiulan, thank you for your hard work. The activity room on the community side has been set up. Please contact me as soon as you finish your part, and we will arrange someone to pick it up.
Zhezhe, Mom has arrived at the school gate and is waiting for you by the electric bike.

Sister Xiuqin, the paper-cutting task went quite smoothly today. I managed to complete several more sets in one go, and it feels like my touch is coming back. How is the preparation of the embroidery fabric pieces going on your side?
【Zhou Xiuqin】I'm getting ready, just finished ironing all the fabric pieces smooth. The paper-cuts you made are really beautiful. Later, teach me that new pattern.
No problem. Once I finish the community tasks, let's find some time to get together and I'll teach you. I'm going to watch TV with my child now.
Mom, everything is ready on my end. The living room is spacious, so you can come directly. We'll start practicing at 7:40.
Zhiqiang, breakfast is ready. Please call the children and Mom to come eat. I'll clean up after we finish. The cooking wine is almost out, so I'll buy some when I go out to take out the trash later.
Sister Zheng, I cut more than a dozen 'integrated Fu characters' this morning, and the progress is going quite smoothly. Rest assured, the order will definitely be completed on time.
